description.hltext_display: 国家金卡工程多功能卡应用推动移动支付艰难前行
description.content:
来源：www.spn.com.cn 作者：中国信息产业商会 张琪 发布时间：2010-12-22 09:10:58 字体:[大 中 小]
关键字：移动支付 银行卡 电子货币 IC卡
摘 要：金卡工程从电子货币银行卡应用起步，迅速扩大到各类智能IC卡的广泛应用，2004年又率先启动了物联网重要感知技术RFID应用试点工作，始终坚持科学发展,努力在实践中探索具有中国特色的信息化发展之路。
国家金卡工程近况
金卡工程是我国信息化建设的四个起步工程之一,1993年，它以电子货币银行卡等各类卡基应用为重点启动实施，涉及国民经济发展、社会进步，直接为改善民生、惠及百姓、构建和谐社会提供技术支撑，是一项跨部门、跨地区、跨世纪的庞大社会系统工程，也是我国信息化建设的重要组成部分。18年来金卡工程建设始终得到国家领导同志的亲切关怀、大力支持和直接指导；参与金卡工程建设的20多个部门和30多个试点城市密切配合、共同努力，勇于探索、大胆实践，做了大量艰苦细致的工作，使金卡工程建设与时俱进，顺应全球技术进步与社会发展大趋势，从银行卡、智能卡（多功能卡）到物联网RFID的典型应用迈出了三大步，始终引领我国信息化重大工程建设积极稳妥地向前推进，取得了重要进展，成效卓著。
金卡工程从电子货币银行卡应用起步，迅速扩大到各类智能IC卡的广泛应用，2004年又率先启动了物联网重要感知技术RFID应用试点工作，始终坚持科学发展,努力在实践中探索具有中国特色的信息化发展之路。
2009至2010年是金卡工程承前启后，贯彻落实国家金卡工程协调领导小组颁布的《国家金卡工程（2008-2013年）发展规划》的关键一年。面对全球金融危机的社会大环境，银行卡应用努力化解风险、加强安全监管，芯片化进程明显加快，促进了技术创新与结构调整，推动着金融IC卡与各大行业及地方IC卡应用的结合，为实现“一卡多用”做出了积极贡献。
银行卡应用推动着金融业的改革与发展
金卡工程首先以电子货币应用起步，促进了银行卡产业的发展，推动着中国金融业的改革与信息化进程。截至2009年底，中国银行业统一标识的银联卡发行总量达22亿张。国内受理银行卡的联网商户达156.7万户，累计安装联网POS机具240.8万台，联网ATM机19.7万台，一个规模化的银行卡受理网络在中国已经形成。随着联网通用的不断深化和受理环境的不断改善，银行卡交易额快速增长。2009年全国银行卡跨行交易额达7.7万亿元，是2001年的84倍。银行卡消费额占社会消费品零售总额中的比重从2001年的2.7%上升到2009年的30%，京、沪、粤等城市超过50%。
国际受理网络建设加快推进，2009年新开通了32个国家、截至目前我国银联卡可在境外84个国家和地区受理业务；已有8个国家和地区的40多家金融机构在境外发行当地货币的银联标准卡。2009年新增银联标准卡4.2亿张，公务卡发行350万张。金卡工程积极支持银行卡应用不断创新支付业务，基于银行卡的手机支付、互联网支付、固定电话支付和数字机顶盒支付等电子支付工具进一步普及，不仅方便了持卡人，同时使我国逐渐变成非现金国家，有力地推动着我国金融业的改革与信息化发展。
智能IC卡应用利国惠民
中国金卡工程的启动实施，促进了各类卡基应用，目前23个部门、行业，30多个试点城市参与国家金卡工程建设。智能IC卡已在我国电信、社会保障、公安、税务、交通、城乡建设及公用事业、医疗卫生、海关石油石化、组织机构代码管理各行各业及社会生活中得到广泛应用，直接惠及百姓，可谓无所不在。我国智能IC卡发卡总量已达70多亿张。特别是电信智能卡、第二代居民身份证（非接触IC卡）、劳动社会保障卡，各种公用事业收费卡和智能交通卡、医疗卫生卡、加油卡、旅游卡等行业性IC卡应用及试点城市“一卡通”工程建设不断深入，我国IC卡应用在电子政务、电子商务及百姓生活、民生及社会活动实践中不断取得新成果，各类IC卡的功能拓展与相互融合，使多功能卡发展的步伐加快。实践证明：智能卡的广泛应用对提高各行业及各级政府部门的现代化管理水平，实施政务公开，建设服务型政府，改善民生，方便百姓生活，推动国民经济和社会信息化进程中都发挥了不容忽视的重要作用。
我国自主的数字化3C产业、移动通信产业和智能卡产业的创立，网络电视、手机电视、手机游戏、手机定位、手机信息搜索，以及基于手机的各类电子支付应用和众多RFID电子标签应用应运而生，进一步促进了中国智能卡产业、无线射频识别RFID产业和手机多媒体应用的融合互动发展，正在打造着更为完整的物联网产业链。
RFID应用试点为物联网发展打下基础
射频识别RFID技术是物联网感知层核心技术之一，也是21世纪最具变革力的一项新技术，得到各国政府普遍关注。早在十多年前，金卡工程就将无线识别技术应用于行业智能卡，如：公安部采用非接触式IC卡成功换发近10亿张居民身份证，这是RFID在金卡工程建设中最早启动的RFID成功应用范例。 2004年金卡工程与时俱进，引领RFID与物联网在中国信息化重大工程建设中进行应用试点与市场开拓，并将推广RFID应用列入金卡工程重点工作，成立了由23个部门参加的RFID应用工作组，并在各试点省市积极而又稳妥地开展试点,务实的推动，现已初见成效。2009年我国RFID市场规模达85.1亿，同比增长了28.3%，在全球已居第三位。
我国在城市公共交通“一卡通”、高速公路不停车收费、智能交通、自动化通关、城市暂住证等各类电子证照与特殊人员管理、烟酒及重要物品防伪和可追溯管理、特种设备强检、CA认证与信息安全管理、动植物电子标识、食品/ 药品供应链安全监管、独生子女（新生儿）及宠物的跟踪管理、军用物资及集装箱、邮件、包裹的实时跟踪管理、奥运会、世博会等大型会议管理及人员、赛事及票务管理，货物运输以及现代物流管理等领域都已先后启动了RFID应用试点，相关部委支持了一批技术产品研发和信息化应用试点工程项目，并取得了实际成效。各部门(行业)和地方支持金卡工程建设,并为构建社会主义和谐社会和探索物联网应用做出了实实在在的贡献。
中国RFID市场规模
中国RFID市场需求已形成规模，2009年中国RFID市场规模已达85.1亿元人民币，同比增长29.3%，在全球居第三位，仅次于英、美国。
金卡工程IC卡行业应用（二代身份证），使中国非接触智能卡的数量已经达全球第一；
国内RFID市场增长主要依靠政府项目的拉动。政府的引导与协调在我国RFID发展中起了决定性的作用。
国家金卡办成立RFID应用工作组，加强交流，把各相关部委和试点城市组织在一起，形成合力，共同推动RFID的行业应用与地方试点，有利于组织协调。
金卡工程多功能应用联盟及城市一卡通运营联盟的成立，进一步推动了多功能智能卡及RFID的发展。
中央领导力主推行多功能卡
早在1996年，国家经济信息化联席会主席、国务院副总理邹家华就明确指示国家金卡办要认真组织研究、开发多功能智能卡，以实现“一卡多用”，方便百姓；此后，朱镕基总理、李岚清、吴邦国、温家宝副总理等都为此做出批示。特别是金卡工程的几个行业大卡：银行卡、电信卡、二代证、社保卡、诊疗卡、加油卡、交通一卡通等，均未能实现跨行业的应用结合，协调难度大。 1993年金卡工程启动时，电子货币银行卡未采用电子部提出的智能卡方案，致使银行卡长期使用磁条卡； 2001年中国银联成立时，金卡办再次力荐发行统一标识智能卡，以促进银行卡与行业大卡的结合，仍未如愿。2005年欧美的EMV迁移我们又努力过一次，成效不大，直到2008年全球金融危机爆发，“一卡多用”才有明显推进。
信息产业从我做起、先行试点
为使多功能卡应用有所突破，走出十年徘徊不前的困境，金卡办决定首选信息产业先行试点。在2007年通过信息产业部电子科技委年度研究课题立项，我们成立了“手机与智能卡‘一卡多用’及RFID应用互动发展研究”课题组，经一年努力，写出了上百页的研究报告，并在信产部万寿路机关组织了手机移动支付应用试点，用手机在食堂及小卖部消费，同时对核心芯片以应用软件研发和测试，通过电子发展基金立项资助。应用试点取得了实质性进展，其中北京握奇数据系统公司开发的SIMpass一卡多用平台和上海复旦大学等单位开发的相关系统，主要解决了多密钥体系、多应用管理、多应用规范支持和多应用开发、电子签名及空中充值等技术。
选择移动支付应用为突破口
手机是我国最具发展潜力的电子信息产品之一，我国是全球最大的手机生产国，并拥有近8亿手机用户，产业与应用发展潜力很大。当今手机已成为人们随身携带的必备物品之一，手机的广泛应用大大提高了人们生活的便捷性，手机正在成为普通百姓生活必需品。手机在企业商务活动中的应用也开始迅猛发展，这种繁荣局面归功于手机上配备的各种新型功能，包括物联网感知识别技术的引入。中国有全球最大的手机市场（8亿用户）和互联网市场（4.3亿户）。在所有新兴的手机应用中，结合智能卡及RFID技术的手机支付与应用手机进行安全防伪以及手机电视及文化传媒是最被用户看好的应用之一。据调查显示，中国八成以上的消费者希望将公交卡、银行卡等支付工具集成到手机上。市场预计，近1-2年，将有50%以上的移动手机集成电子钱包功能，以便能支持短距离通信，方便且安全的交易。未来手机将集成几乎所有的关键应用，手机与RFID技术应用的互动发展，将为我国手机市场开辟新的服务模式和广阔的前景，也将为拉动RFID的需求和规模化应用，促进RFID与物联网产业的发展起到重要作用。
从电信智能卡到物联网业务拓展
电信智能卡是金卡工程IC卡应用的主力军，约占我国IC卡市场总量的75%。随着电信重组、3G全面商用及三网融合的加速，电信智能卡支持的卡端应用如雨后春笋，蓬勃发展。2009年移动运营商结合金卡工程推行“一卡多用”，积极拓展移动支付应用。目前手机支付已在超市、商场、影院、快餐店、咖啡店、电子门禁和大型活动场所等得到广泛应用，人们可利用手机方便的刷卡消费。
智能卡与RFID应用融合发展
银行卡芯片化势在必行
最近两年，随着全球金融危机的冲击及美国的教训，使得化解金融风险与强化信息安全工作倍受关注。我国央行会同各大商业银行，积极推进银行卡芯片化进程，中国银联更是务实的工作，09年这项工作取得了较快进展。金卡办力促银行卡与重点行业IC卡应用结合，支持金卡试点城市宁波，基于金融IC卡标准发行城市市民卡或“一卡通”，並以其为载体，发行联名卡並与电子钱包等多种应用相结合，已成功发行数十万张。截至今年基于BPOC2.0的银行IC卡累计发行了600多万张。
面对全球金融危机，为有效化解金融风险，实现银行卡（22亿张）与行业IC卡（70亿张）应用的结合，我国银行业加强技术创新与结构调整，芯片化进程明显加快，也为推行多功能IC卡铺平道路。
近年发生的美国金融业4000万张信用卡的信息泄露等一系列安全问题，以及国内银行ATM诈骗、网上银行账户盗取等安全事件，使民众对电子银行的安全性产生了不信任。提高电子支付渠道的安全性是当前我国金融服务市场面临的首要问题。国内电子银行服务仍局限于传统业务，营业模式单一，安全性有待提高。但随着上述问题的逐步解决，电子银行业务发展将提速。
随着金卡工程强化跨部门间IC卡应用的融合，以及包括卡基支付、网上支付和手机移动支付等在内的各种电子支付工具的进一步普及和完善，有力地推动着我国电子银行业务的发展，同时也强化了金融监管，逐步形成了以网上银行为主导的新兴银行服务渠道。
“一卡多用”支持的应用
一、手机支付：门票、车票、购物、公用事业费、城市一卡通；
二、全新小额支付：广电金卡、网上购物、网络游戏等；
三、安全认证：门禁、身份认证、电子证照；
四、电子钱包：POS机支付服务；
五、电子门票：影院、剧场、公园、娱乐等；
六、大额支付：购房、买车、手机网上银行业务；
目标：不断改善个人、组织和国家在信息社会中的安全状况和方便与舒适程度，致力于提升百姓的生活质量与幸福感。
手机支付业务简介
1、基于移动通信网、互联网及近距离通信技术，利用手机终端进行消费、充值、转账、查询等电子商务业务；
2、提供随时、随地、随身、随心的电子商务服务，具有超越传统电子商务规模的潜力；
3、支持远程支付、现场支付；
4、支持联机交易、脱机交易；
5、拥有数量庞大的潜在用户群；
6、环保、便捷、安全。
多功能卡应用联盟应运而生
中央领导曾多次指示：金卡工程要抓好统筹规划和组织协调，要提倡“一卡多用”和发行“多功能卡”。金卡工程关键是联网、通用，要推行通用卡，当务之急是建立统一的业务规范和技术标准，坚持以人为本，从方便企业和公众使用出发，积极推行“一卡多用”。希望各部门、各行业加强信息资源的整合和共享，不断丰富IC卡的应用功能，切实方便人民群众，同时要加强信息安全保障和风险控制工作。
为全面贯彻落实领导指示精神，推动金卡工程实现“一卡多用”和发行多功能卡，推动产业与应用融合互动发展，在国家金卡办的组织协调和各相关部门的共同支持下，国家金卡工程多功能卡应用联盟于2007年12月13日在北京成立。来自20多个部门（行业）的领导和代表；首批试点省市及六大通信运营商的代表；IT企事业单位及社会各界代表200人参会。反映出应用联盟的成立适应了各部门及企事业单位的共同需要。大家对整合资源、优势互补、齐心协力办大事，抢占自主创新与核心技术的掌控权达成了共识，大家站在国家全局利益的基础上推动联盟的创建。
金卡应用联盟简介
它是一个跨众多部门和地区，全国性、非营利的组织。联盟以“创新、合作、服务、共赢”为宗旨，接受相关政府部门的业务指导。发起单位主要有：中国银联、中国移动、中国联通、中国电信、中国网通、中国电子信息产业集团、中国电子科技集团、中国普天集团、大唐集团以及我国智能卡和RFID产业链上下游骨干企事业单位。
主要任务包括：
（一）推动金卡工程“多功能卡应用”及相关配套产业发展；
（二）以企业为主体，创新研制相关标准，以最大限度的实现资源共享和服务共享，实现国家利益的最大化并推进相关信息安全产业发展；
（三）加强跨部门、跨行业、跨地区的合作，坚持产用结合、互利共赢和融合发展。
（四）开拓应用、培育市场，努力服务于创新型国家建设，并为构建和谐社会，推动两化融合做出金卡工程的新贡献。
联盟主席团成员中国移动、中国联通、中国银联、中国电信和中国普天等。理事长张琪；2008至2009年首届轮值主席为中国移动，2009至2010年第二届主席为中国银联。
金卡城市“一卡通”建设推动着 “一卡多用”与移动支付的发展
随着金卡工程“一卡多用”、推行多功能卡，以及30多个试点城市“一卡通”工程建设的陆续深入，我国IC卡应用在电子政务、电子商务实践中不断取得新成果，各类IC卡的功能拓展与相互融合发展的步伐在加快。行业性IC卡应用与城市“一卡通”工程的结合已是大势所趋，促进了相互的渗透与融合。推动了业务的转型，创新着营运模式和利益分配模式的转变，也为跨部门和跨地区的合作与联合发展奠定了基础，正在催生着移动支付这一新的经济增长点。
制定移动支付标准刻不容缓
金卡工程行业IC卡应用与城市一卡通工程快速发展，移动支付需求与日俱增，我国手机支付用户总量达数千万户，据咨询公司Informa报告认为，预计到2013年，移动支付的市场规模将达到8600亿美元。
经验：信息化建设坚持标准先行
1993年我们以“三金工程”（金桥、金卡、金关）启动了中国的信息化建设。“三金”工程是跨部门、跨地区的庞大社会系统工程，涉及面广、参与的部门多，技术协调工作量极大。为了使工程建设顺利推进，能够实现互联互通与信息资源和服务的共享，必须率先制定统一的规范与标准，所以1993年由5个部门联合组成的国家金卡工程办公室，立即成立了四个工作小组，其中之一就是标准化工作组。
教训：产业发展切身感受标准化工作的重要
我在IT业界工作41年，在部机关也已33年，我深刻体会到标准与知识产权对我国信息产业发展是何等的重要！我也亲身经历和目睹了太多的因缺失核心技术和标准，造成产业发展的被动与财富的流失，教训是刻骨铭心的！这就是我们为什么这么强调自力更生、坚持产用结合、重视自主创新，能够坚定的、义无反顾的提倡支持使用国货的根本原因和动力所在！
我们的标准战略
我们主张从中国的国情出发，坚持自主创新与开放兼容相结合的标准战略，一方面坚持开放和兼容，实现互联互通与资源共享；同时坚持自主创新，抢占标准、专利制高点和掌握发展主动权！更多的拥有自主知识产权和标准，这是产业发展的生命线和财源，更是信息安全与国家最高利益之所在！
移动支付标准必须统一
如何制定这个标准？第一、要坚持自力更生和自主创新，第二、要坚持对外开放和兼容。因为在全球一体化的社会中必须得互联互通。从第一点来讲，中国要有统一的标准，因为我们的产业无法应对多种标准需求，产业太分散，不可能形成规模与合力，所以中国要制定自己统一的标准。2007年，我们把三大运营商和中国银联作为核心团队成立了金卡工程多功能卡应用联盟，2009年又以其为核心团队，跨部门正式成立了移动支付标准工作组，希望大家统一认识，求同存异，目的是想拿出一个统一的中国标准。
加强协调与合作
提倡“一卡多用”，发行多功能卡，技术上没有不可逾越的，都可以实现，最关键的是组织协调。工作实践使我深刻体会一分技术、九分协调。要先制定统一的标准和规范，再把部门、地方的利益都协调好，按照可操作的商业模式，还要有合理的利益分配模式，让大家都能接受，我们是通过创新，通过合作，取长补短、求同存异，达到互利互惠，来实现共赢。
创新发展模式，推动信息服务业建设
目前，银联扮演跨行资金清算、划拨公共服务平台的角色，今后不光是银行系统间的清算，这个平台要跨更多部门和地方，真正的第三方服务，拿着手机消费，其收益有些是给运营商，有些给到银行，有些给到社保部门、住建部门，或者是卫生医院等，这是一个跨部门和跨地区的“大清算”的概念。这就是1993年我们提出的“大金卡”概念，由第三方提供的广泛的公共服务与应用平台，创建新的现代信息服务业。
移动支付标准工作组成立
国家金卡工程多功能卡应用联盟于2007年末成立，围绕四项任务开展工作，首选移动支付作为多功能卡应用试点的突破口，启动了标准研制工作。经过近两年协调与磨合，2009年11月正式成立了移动支付标准工作组。
任务：在政府行业主管部门的指导下，联合社会各方面力量，开展移动支付标准体系的研究，并以企业为主体进行标准的预先研究和制修订工作。
指导思想：坚持自主创新与开放兼容相结合，加强协调与合作，尽快研制符合中国国情的标准体系，同时积极参与国际标准的制定工作，以抢占制高点，掌握发展的主动权。
组织落实情况：确定中国银联为移动支付标准工作组组长单位，中国移动、中国电信、中国联通、电子四所为副组长单位，标准组秘书处设在电子四所。目前有正式成员单位40多家。
主要工作进展
1、2010年1月22日在北京召开了移动支付标准工作组骨干企业座谈会，国家金卡工程协调领导小组办公室主任、中国RFID产业联盟理事长强调了移动支付的庞大市场需求和加快制定我国自主移动支付标准的紧迫性，指出，当前“智慧地球”、“感知中国”和物联网发展带来了难得的历史机遇，必将推动多功能卡及RFID应用试点工作。首先要抓好移动支付标准化工作，移动支付标准化工作离不开运营商和金融机构的共同参与，应加强协调与合作，从国家、全局利益出发，务实工作、求同存异，尽快研制出统一的标准。理事长提出的“自主创新与开放兼容相结合的标准战略”得到认同。
2、2010年5月13日，标准工作组秘书处组织中国银联和三大运营商中国移动、中国联通、中国电信在京召开了移动支付国家标准研讨会。重点讨论了如何加强各方的协调与合作，加快统一的国家标准制定进程，引导移动支付产业健康有序的发展。完善现有的国家标准草案。
3、2010年7月2日,秘书处组织银联和三大运营商结合各自的试点应用情况对目前市场上的各种移动支付技术方案从技术特点、产业链情况、应用环境现状、试用及验证情况、标准支持情况、知识产权状况等方面进行了详细的分析并进行了深入的交流。分歧意见在减少，认识逐步趋同。
存在的主要问题
1、标准方案尚未统一
国内手机支付技术标准主要有两种方案：以中国银联为主导的13.56MHz标准，中国移动为主导的2.4GHz标准。
银联标准适用于大部分现有的POS机终端。支持的是金融行业所认可的标准。中国联通和中国电信都属于银联阵营。
中国移动的2.4GHzRFID-SIM技术为国内企业自主研发，用户只需更换手机SIM卡可使用手机支付服务，使用成本较低、且方便，但需要金融和公交部门配合改装POS机终端。
由于没有统一的标准，国内手机支付行业的发展受到制约。
2、政出多门，重复组织，思路不一
金卡工程从抓多功能卡应用入手，力推银行卡与智能卡应用的结合，工作有连贯性，承担跨部门和跨地方的统一组织协调时间长（18年），相互了解，也较务实。相关部门和地方也在出面组织，由于介入时间不一，情况了解不够全面，出发点和定位也不相同。
3、政府支持的力度不够，政策资金也不落实，亟待强化统一务实和尽可能减少重复、浪费和利益制衡。
4、9月1日起实施的《非金融机构支付服务管理办法》明确规定，非金融机构提供支付服务，应当申请取得《支付业务许可证》，但适用范围和具体细则不太明确。
结束语
党的17届五中全会及中央经济工作会为我们指明了前进的方向：优化经济结构、推动经济转型和健全公共服务成为未来五年我国经济和社会发展中的两个重要战略方向。今年9月国务院颁布了“关于加快培育和发展战略性新兴产业的决定”，物联网作为新一代信息技术的重要组成部分，已正式列入我国战略性新兴产业首批七个重点产业中。物联网的广泛应用，对推动我国传统产业升级优化、经济结构调整和发展方式转变，促进我国经济社会科学、协调、可持续发展，有效提升百姓的生活质量和幸福感发挥着重要作用。
国家金卡工程移动支付等多功能卡应用、RFID应用与物联网的发展为我们提供了难得的历史机遇，它将促进我国传统产业的升级改造，推动国家经济结构调整与发展模式的转变，对促进社会进步与百姓生活质量的提高发挥重要作用。它也是IT等战略性新兴产业发展的新增长点，将推动中国信息化建设在更高层面、更广领域向纵深发展。物联网要紧紧围绕改善民生、惠及百姓、构建和谐社会的大方向，在应用与服务的过程中坚持科学、务实的发展。
我们要努力建设服务型政府，不断提高人民的卫生医疗水平，更加关注健康管理，努力营造环境，使百姓生活得更加幸福。为传统产业的改造升级、让物联网与信息技术应用造福于百姓，为我中华民族的伟大复兴，做出新的贡献！
新闻投稿合作邮箱：yktchina-admin@163.com 字体[大 中 小] [收藏] [进入博客] [进入论坛] [推荐给朋友]

description.hltext_display: A look at the soup kitchen staff
description.content:
LOCKPORT — The Sister Mary Loretto Memorial Soup Kitchen is driven by a team of workers and volunteers who do the best they can to make patrons feel at home.
Salvation Army Director Maj. John Wheeler who has been working there for six years said the soup kitchen could not run without they staff they have.
“The soup kitchen requires persons with many different skills,” Wheeler said.
One person works with the menus and inventory, while Wheeler handles the finances and administration.
Robert Drinkwater manages volunteers. Chris Gresart oversees product handling and Karen Sennett supervises the cooking and food preparation.
“This team gets along well, but is far from able to get all of the work done,” Wheeler said. “Beyond the five of us, everything is done by volunteers.”
Without volunteers, Wheeler said the soup kitchen would not be what it is today.
The soup kitchen needs donations and with the kitchen’s annual fundraising drive under way, donations are being accepted now to their goal of $65,000. The running total as of Tuesday was $41,929.80
Donations may be sent by clipping the coupon on the front page of the US&J, which appears Monday through Saturday. Gifts may be made in honor or memory of a loved one, and the donor’s name, the amount of the donation and the sentiments of the donor will be published. Donors also can remain anonymous.
The donations, along with the completed coupons, can be dropped off at any First Niagara Bank or mailed to First Niagara Bank, 55 East Ave., Lockport, NY 14094.

description.hltext_display: '3G in India: Operator Launch Strategies' and Other Research Reports by Ovum Available at MarketPublishers.com
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE The Market Publishers Ltd
LONDON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Market Publishers Ltd informs that new in-demand market research reports by Ovum have been added to its catalogue.
3G in India: Operator Launch Strategies. The report describes data services targeted at specific market segments, provides the key to faster returns on network investments. The research provides the information on the operators that are now planning their network rollout and service strategies and discusses 3G launch strategies in India …
Global Services Contracts 1H10: Telcos on a Bankers' Bonus. Banks are back in the market for global network services, with technology and manufacturing companies joining them as key innovators in communications. The report provides a detailed analysis of the global service providers...
America Movil. The research dwells on the company focus on bundled offerings and multi-play services as well as expanding 3G network capacity to drive the next phase of growth. The research discusses strategic objectives and the process of integration of newly acquired operations and stiff competition from regional and local players as key challenges …
The Status of Mobile Termination Regulation in the EU15. The report provides a detailed analysis of how current MTRs were determined across the EU15 and look at how NRAs are taking the Recommendation into consideration as they undertake new market analyses. The research discusses EC recommendations aimed at harmonizing the charges across Europe …
Despite LTE, HSPA+ Keeps Evolving. This report describes the main HSPA+ enhancements brought by 3GPP R8, R9, and R10. It also offers early trends for these future HSPA+ options. The report provides technical overview of HSPA evolutionary options and mobile broadband connection forecasts for 2009-2015 …
More new market research reports by Ovum can be found at http://marketpublishers.com/members/ovum/info.html

description.hltext_display: McClain: If Texans have heart, better show it now
description.author: JOHN M
description.content:
The Texans played at Tennessee as if they want to get coach Gary Kubiak fired.
The players say they want Kubiak to return, but their actions in the 31-17 loss to the Titans, including the 21-0 deficit in the first quarter, say otherwise.
Bob McNair would never admit this publicly, of course, but after watching his team stink it up in Nashville, it would be understandable if he had second thoughts about his comments last week.
A week ago, McNair all but said Kubiak would return for a sixth season. He said some of his partners told him at a league meeting that the Texans were on the right track and close to being an outstanding team. And McNair agreed even though the evidence shows they've been a monster disappointment this season.
McNair doesn't want to fire Kubiak. He likes and respects his coach. He wants reasons to justify keeping Kubiak ? even if most fans and media disagree - but based on the rotten egg they laid in Nashville, he may have to reconsider.
If the Texans play Denver and Jacksonville the way they played Tennessee, I wouldn't be surprised if McNair makes a change. No one predicted a 5-11 finish, not even the team's most cynical fans and harshest critics.
The Texans need to win the last two games to finish 7-9. Those are meaningless games to everyone but McNair, Kubiak and his staff.
It's intriguing to gauge the interest in Kubiak in Houston compared to Denver. Fans and media in Houston want him gone. Yesterday. Fans in Denver want him back.
There's media speculation among Broncos fans if Kubiak is fired, he could be hired by owner Pat Bowlen and John Elway, who they want running the front office.
The Texans have lost seven of eight going into the Denver game. They own last place in the AFC South. They've been a disaster since their 4-2 start.
The Texans have allowed at least 29 points in nine of 10 games. The only one in which they allowed fewer than 29 was the shutout of Tennessee and rookie quarterback Rusty Smith.
Now the Texans are facing their second rookie quarterback in Tim Tebow.
Tebow will energize the Broncos in his second start. He may never be good enough to become a regular starter, but he's ignited a group of dead men walking on both sides of the ball.
The Texans rank 30th in defense and 32nd against the pass, allowing 275.1 yards a game. They've surrendered 31 touchdown passes, tying Dallas for the most in the league.
It was strange watching defensive tackle Antonio Smith complaining after the loss to the Titans that one problem was the players not always having each other's backs. He was asked several times what exactly he was talking about, but he never explained it.
Here's what I think Smith meant. He saw Titans guard Leroy Harris launching cheap shots at his teammates. Smith went after Harris to show he wouldn't get away with it. Then, Harris made a run at Smith.
I think Smith was angry because he felt none of his teammates had his back against Harris.
Brian Cushing tried to prevent Smith from getting a retaliation penalty, and it ended up with Smith pulling the linebacker's helmet off, causing an unsportsmanlike conduct penalty of 12 yards.
Smith said after the game there was no problem between him and Cushing. The linebacker said the same thing after the game and Monday.
One reason the Texans signed Smith was because he's a tough guy who will always defend his teammates, no matter how he has to do it. After watching his outburst, it's going to be interesting to see what kind of mindset his teammates have when they enter Mile High Stadium.
Will they show they still have some pride, or will they continue to play like losers?
John McClain can be heard on Sports Radio 610 on Monday at 8:30 a.m., Wednesday at 7:30 a.m. and Friday at 4:30 p.m. john.mcclain@chron.com.

Kubiak would return for a sixth season
some of his partners told him at a league meeting that the Texans were on the right track and close to being an outstanding team

description.hltext_display: Krakow’s Museum of Contemporary Art opens in former Schindler factory
description.content:
Visitors to the building in its first month could, however, see the exhibition, “Architecture For Sensitive Lives”—a presentation of work by Italian architects Claudio Nardi and Leonardo Maria Proli, who designed the museum, as well as documentary films on construction projects taking place in the area, which is undergoing regeneration. On 6 December, the museum closed again to visitors so that renovations could be completed.
The exhibition programme properly kicks off in mid-May with the show, “History in Art”, for which 44 international artists have been invited to display their works. Additionally, 20 works will join the museum’s permanent collection. Director Anna Maria Potocka said she intends to boost the museum’s permanent collection through her private collection of contemporary Polish art.
The premature launch of the museum is seen by many as a political move by the president of Krakow, Jacek Majchrowski. The opening ceremony took place five days before the local elections, which Majchrowski subsequently won. “From the start it was clear that the construction schedule ran parallel with the elections,” said Potocka. “However, politicians' employment of such tactics in their election campaigns benefits the art community.”
Potocka's appointment by the president of Krakow was met with controversy at the beginning of the year and led artists Wilhelm Sasnal and Marta Deskur to found the Committee for Transparency in Cultural Policy in Krakow. Following the appointment, a letter was submitted to the ministry of culture requesting an open, international call for applicants to fill the director's position. The minister, however, stood by his decision.

she intends to boost the museum?s permanent collection through her private collection of contemporary Polish art

description.hltext_display: Milwaukee ends Lakers' 5-game win streak, 98-79
description.content:
LOS ANGELES With a lengthy road trip just behind them and the Miami Heat looming directly ahead, the Los Angeles Lakers were plenty aware the short-handed Milwaukee Bucks represented a potential trap.
The Lakers fell headfirst into it anyway.
Earl Boykins scored a season-high 22 points, John Salmons added 20 and the Bucks stunned lifeless Los Angeles on Tuesday night, snapping the two-time defending champions' five-game winning streak with a 98-79 victory.
Kobe Bryant scored 21 points before getting ejected and Pau Gasol added 15 points and 11 rebounds for the Lakers, who flopped in their final tuneup before their Christmas visit from LeBron James and Dwyane Wade.
"I told them I don't think they can play any worse than that," Lakers coach Phil Jackson said. "This is what we were worried about. We got out of whack there in the second half and never recovered."
Los Angeles had won six straight over the Bucks, who had lost three in a row over the past week and were down to nine healthy players after a 26-point loss at Portland one night earlier. But those nine Bucks played stellar defense and hit more than 50 percent of their shots for just the third time all season.
"Both ends were good for us, so I don't want to pick one," Milwaukee coach Scott Skiles said. "In the second half, we were as good as we've been all year on the defensive end. To hold that team to 33 points, and 13 in the fourth quarter, that's a difficult task."
With the defense holding the Lakers to their franchise low in points against Milwaukee, the Bucks jumped ahead early and finished the game on a 21-7 run, keeping the Lakers scoreless for nearly four minutes down the stretch. The Lakers' crowd waited patiently for a run that never came, and the Bucks even sent a few fans to the exits early, giving them four days to stew on the loss before the Heat's visit.
"I guess you could say there's a possibility (of looking ahead), but I don't think so," said Derek Fisher, who scored just two points in 28 minutes. "Even in looking past someone, that requires an action on your part. So I don't think it was so much about the opponent. I just think we didn't play the type of game that we needed to play. I guess things would have been different if the opponent was different, but I can't say that."
The Lakers left their game on their impressive seven-game road trip, losing at Staples Center for just the third time in 13 games.
Bryant was ejected with 2:07 to play, earning two quick technical fouls after being called for an offensive foul. He also refused to speak to reporters after the game.
"We deserved to lose," said Lamar Odom, who had 12 points and 10 rebounds. "We obviously have to move on, but I feel like that is a game we should win."
Andrew Bogut scored 15 points for the Bucks, who played without injured regulars Brandon Jennings, Corey Maggette and Drew Gooden on the second stop of a three-game road trip.
Ersan Ilyasova had 17 points and 11 rebounds for the Bucks, who seemed a bit stunned by the ease with which they earned an improbable celebration in the visitors' locker room.
"They usually always make a run in the fourth quarter," said Boykins, the 5-foot-5 backup guard who hit four 3-pointers. "We were just trying to stay in front for as long as possible. If you play with effort and belief, you can do anything."
Boykins' rub-it-in 3-pointer with 2:16 left capped his night as an unlikely substitute for Jennings, the Bucks' leading scorer.
"He learned a long time ago to use his size to his advantage," Skiles said. "We wouldn't have won the game without Earl tonight."
The Lakers openly worried about overlooking the Bucks in their return from the road, speaking specifically about the possibility during the pregame shootaround. Milwaukee scored 107 points in an 11-point home loss to the Lakers on Nov. 16, causing matchup problems for the champions.
Yet from the opening tip at Staples Center, the Bucks appeared more motivated and better prepared. Milwaukee made seven of its first eight shots and rarely trailed during the first three quarters.
After consecutive baskets by Boykins and Luc Richard Mbah a Moute put the Bucks ahead 82-72 with six minutes left, Milwaukee's game was encapsulated on the next possession: Salmons was faked to the floor by Bryant, yet still managed to strip the ball from Bryant in a seated position when the Lakers superstar drove past him.
NOTES: Gooden is away from the Bucks to get treatment on his injured right foot, while Maggette missed his second straight game with an apparent concussion. Maggette hopes to return for Thursday's visit to Sacramento, but Jennings ? who scored 31 points against Los Angeles last month ? will be out for at least a month after surgery on his broken left foot. ... Fans near courtside included Leonardo DiCaprio, Jon Cryer and Dr. Dre.

description.hltext_display: 19 Schüsse auf "Gentleman-Räuber"
脏乱小吃摊摆成一条街
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯（记者 轩燕龙）昨天下午5时许，5号线地铁天通苑北站外，道路被小吃摊上的灯光照亮。乘客一出站就是扑面的香味儿，有些人在小吃摊位前买来边走边吃。
在天通苑北站的出站口外，二十余个小吃摊沿街排开，摊子都集中在通向公交车站的道路上。在这里，肉夹馍、煎饼、炒面等各式各样的小吃一应俱全。小吃摊的模式大同小异三轮车上装一个架子，架子顶上挂着招牌和照明设备。
“中午吃完饭一般是12点多，晚上6点才下班，一般下班的时候已经饿了。再在5号线上挤上个把钟头，一出地铁就闻到饭香，肯定想吃，再说这些吃食也没多少钱，饿了也顾不上脏不脏了。”李先生刚买完肉夹馍边吃边说。
【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: A reality we'd love to see
description.content:
While Sarah Palin’s regular Rock ’Em, Sock ’Em Robot jabs at the Obama administration make sense for someone with presidential ambitions, her wild swings at Michelle Obama’s campaign to fight childhood obesity is like repeatedly hitting herself in the head. Or shooting herself in the foot, to use the more familiar idiom.
In a spontaneous moment on her “reality” TV show, Palin searches for ingredients to make “s’mores.” Then she says: “This is in honor of Michelle Obama, who said the other day we should not have dessert.”
(Palin might as well have said: “You can have this s’more when you pry it from my cold, sticky, dead hands!”)
Actually, Obama’s Draconian pronouncement was to tell her daughters that dessert wasn’t a “right.”
The first lady launched the “Let’s Move!” initiative because of the alarming number of overweight children in the United States today.
Palin doesn’t dispute that childhood obesity and accompanying health issues pose a serious problem, it’s just that she suddenly doesn’t want government involved in programs that promote health, or in her view, tell people how to eat or parents how to parent.
That’s funny, where was she in 2001 when the U.S. Surgeon General issued the “Call to Action to Prevent and Decrease Overweight and Obesity”? That initiative, with its “Healthy People 2010” objective, seeks to reduce obesity among adults to 15 percent (from the current 26.7 percent) over 10 years. (By 2007, no state had met that objective, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported.)
Palin was mayor of Wasilla, Alaska, at that time, so she might have been unaware of the initiative.
She was governor of Alaska a few years later, however, when that state launched its “Reversing Alaska’s Childhood Obesity Trend: A Comprehensive Initiative.” It’s a comprehensive, laudable version of the federal initiative.
No one cried governmental interference in Alaska. In fact, a poll of Alaskans found that 90 percent of adults agree that parents and individuals have “a lot” of responsibility for addressing obesity. But, a large percentage of adults also agree that government (62 percent), the food industry (79 percent) and schools (86 percent) have “some” or “a lot” of responsibility for addressing obesity.
How can it possibly be wrong for Michelle Obama to encourage kids to exercise and eat right?
Why Palin thinks this is a fight to pick is known to her alone.
Maybe she could execute an athletic about-face and host a fund-raiser to benefit the Let’s Move! initiative. Maybe she could challenge Michelle Obama to an arm-wrestling match. People would pay to see that.

description.hltext_display: Banks maintain inflexible lending criteria
description.content:
Investec has warned that many people who accrue unconventional income through lump sum bonuses will struggle to get a mortgage by some less flexible banks.
According to Investec almost a third (32%) of IFAs say that their clients are expecting at least half of their bonus for the 2010/2011 tax year to be paid in cash or deferred cash with the remainder likely to be paid as shares or share options.
Investec says that FSA proposals that 50% of bank bonuses should be paid in shares, share-linked instruments or via equivalent non-cash routes, could make it more difficult for many of these individuals to secure large mortgage loans.
Whilst almost one in 10 (8%) of IFAs questioned said their clients are expecting their bonus to consist almost entirely (91-100%) of cash or deferred cash, a further 28% understand that cash will account for less than 10% of their clients’ bonus payments this year. Investec has warned that these individuals could be penalised when it comes to applying for large mortgage loans as many banks will look at the value of a clients’ property rather than their income and overall assets.
Jack Jones of Investec Specialist Private Bank said, “These findings show that while cash is still likely to feature bonus payments this year, many people will receive bonuses via non-cash routes such as shares or share-linked instruments. Although many of these individuals look set to receive significant bonuses, some will struggle to get mortgages and other personal loans approved due to the less flexible lending criteria adopted by some banks.”
Over three quarters (78%) of the IFAs surveyed say their clients are expecting to receive their bonus payment within a year or less, despite the forthcoming FSA regulation that will force those receiving a bonus, to defer up to 60% of it for three years or more. Investec believes that these results highlight the divergence in understanding between forthcoming industry regulation and the expectations of those due to receive bonuses.
Interestingly over a fifth (21%) of IFAs surveyed said that their clients have been discussing their financial plans with them earlier this year than in previous years. This is likely to be partly due to the introduction of a new 50% tax rate on incomes over £150,000, which starts from 1 January 2011.
Jack Jones continued, “We concentrate on the intricacies of a client’s finances in order to better understand their ‘true’ wealth, as opposed to taking the rigid stance adopted by many other lenders who remain focused on the property asset rather than the individual. We have the experience and expertise to structure a lending facility which accommodates their financial requirements.”

event_or_fact.property: while cash is still likely to feature bonus payments this year, many people will receive bonuses via non-cash routes such as shares or share-linked instruments.

description.hltext_display: Abuse awareness training for magistrates after murder
description.content: Police reviewing the murder of a Leicestershire mother of two by her former lover have recommended that magistrates should be offered extra training in domestic abuse awareness. The proposal was made by Leicestershire Police officers in a review into the death of mother-of-two Karen Brookes.Ms Brookes was murdered by Kevin Sainsbury on November 12 last year after she endured months of physical and verbal abuse from her former lover. At the time of the brutal attack, 51-year-old Sainsbury, who had been in a relationship with Ms Brookes for around 15 years, had been granted bail by magistrates after he was arrested and charged with threatening to kill her.He was sentenced last month by a judge at Nottingham Crown Court to a minimum of 25 years in prison for the murder of 37-year-old Ms Brookes.After the conclusion of the trial, unnamed magistrates at Hinckley were criticised by Ms Brookes' family for freeing Sainsbury by granting him bail.The family said at the time: "We feel that Karen was let down by the justice system prior to her death. He had a violent past, some of which was more recent, and these facts must have been known to the magistrates that dealt with him. He certainly should not have been released to then be able to go on and commit this horrific crime that took the life of Karen and destroyed so many other lives in the process." Leicestershire Police refused a freedom of information request to release an unedited copy of the report into Ms Brookes' death, which was carried out in November last year, but did confirm it included a proposal for domestic abuse awareness training.A statement released by the force said: "Despite presenting the magistrates with what the Independent Police Complaints Commission (IPCC) called a 'robust bail application' Kevin Sainsbury was not remanded into custody. "An internal review recommended that consideration could be given to providing specialist domestic violence awareness training to Magistrates and CPS prosecutors to provide them with a greater understanding of patterns of offending in domestic abuse cases. This could be led by specialist Police Domestic Abuse officers and include input from domestic violence refuge charities and organisations and possibly victims." A spokeswoman for the force said that since the proposals were put forward some magistrates were already undergoing such training.Copyright (c) Press Association Ltd. 2010, All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: 韩国军舰出海战机升空 加强巡逻严防朝鲜突袭
description.content:
21日，韩国在延坪岛海域实施火炮射击演习一天后，韩国军队依然保持高度警惕，战舰和战机加强巡逻，以防朝鲜可能的“突袭”。
“没有反应并非让步”
20日的演习在韩朝争议海域进行。此前朝方警告说，若韩国不取消演习，将遭到比上月延坪岛炮击更严重打击。但昨日演习结束后，朝方又转变态度，称“不值得”对韩方予以回击。尽管如此，韩军21日仍高度警惕，严防朝鲜可能的报复行动。韩国防部当天称，战斗机继续在韩领空巡逻，一艘宙斯盾驱逐舰也在黄海处于待命状态。
同一天，韩国还在距离朝鲜3公里的一个海岛点亮了一个高达30米的钢制圣诞树。韩方在朝韩边界点亮圣诞树被朝鲜视为宣传战。
2003年，朝韩达成停止宣传战协议后，韩方停止了这一举措。21日重启“圣诞树宣传战”后，为防止朝鲜炮击“圣诞树”，海岛进入局部挑衅最高警戒态势，并部署了海兵陆战队队员，24小时监视朝方动向。
一名韩政府高官21日对韩媒体称，目前朝鲜还没有做出反应并不意味着就此让步，其过去曾多次发动“突袭”。另一名高官称，朝鲜之所以军演当天没有作出反应，是因为韩国军队做好了全面准备，“我们还必须观望”。
演习多为短程炮弹
而据韩国《朝鲜日报》报道，韩军20日的炮火射击虽猛烈，但也采取了避免刺激朝鲜的措施。报道说，当天韩军共发射了1600多枚炮弹，其中1500枚射程仅2至4公里，射程达40公里的火炮只发射了4枚炮弹，射程达30公里的火箭炮也未投入演习。
军演也在韩国国内引发争议。21日，韩国5个在野党及一些市民团体发表联合声明，谴责政府不顾军事冲突可能性，坚持进行演习，置国民生命和安全于不顾。声明敦促韩朝立即进行对话。
“朝鲜对延坪岛射击训练未进行反击，并同意国际原子能机构核查人员重返朝鲜，将核燃料棒出售并运到第三国，这是双方启动对话的积极信号。”声明说。(马晶)
-立场
中国：朝有权和平用核但须受监督
本报讯(记者邢世伟)昨日，在外交部例行记者会上，外交部发言人姜瑜表态称，中方支持美朝保持接触，希望有关接触有利于为重启六方会谈。
对于理查森称朝鲜表示愿接受国际原子能机构人员赴朝核查一事，姜瑜表示，根据9.19共同声明，朝鲜有和平利用核能的权利，但同时必须接受国际原子能机构的保障监督。中方希望有关问题在六方会谈框架内处理。
近日，有报道称中国阻止安理会发表声明谴责朝鲜。对此，姜瑜表示，个别媒体的报道不符合实际情况。安理会19日紧急审议了半岛局势。包括中、俄、美在内的安理会成员为避免半岛再次发生武装冲突做出了努力，这是具有积极意义的。当前半岛形势复杂敏感。中方希望安理会及时呼吁有关各方保持最大程度冷静克制，避免采取可能导致局势升级的举动，尽快恢复对话。
-动向
朝愿出售万余核材料？
刚结束访朝的美国新墨西哥州长理查森21日表示，朝鲜一反其强硬态度，对韩国延坪岛演习未进行反击，这是希望对话的表现。
理查森当天在北京对媒体表示，朝鲜方面愿意接受国际原子能机构对其宁边核设施的核查，愿意就向海外出售1.2万枚未使用过的核燃料棒展开谈判。另外，朝方还同意由韩朝美共同组建监察纷争地区的军事委员会，并铺设韩朝军事热线。目前，朝方还未证实上述消息。
理查森说，他在北京期间没有会见中国外交官的计划，将会尽快返回美国，向美国国务院汇报访朝结果。
“作为私人访问，我的角色只能到此为止，希望有关国家在此基础上进行外交斡旋，争取进一步的进展。”理查森说。去年4月，朝鲜宣布退出六方会谈，同时要求国际原子能机构核查人员撤离。(宗合)★

description.hltext_display: 17 Stunden in einem Minsker Gefängnis
description.content:
Nach der umstrittenen Präsidentschaftswahl geht die Regierung repressiv gegen Oppositionelle und Journalisten vor. Eine Journalistin berichtet über ihre Erfahrungen aus einem Minsker Gefängnis.
Minsk «Fasst Sie!», ruft ein Mann in Zivil mehreren Polizisten zu. Nur wenige Sekunden später kniet die Afp-Journalistin Maria Antonova mit hinter dem Kopf verschränkten Händen in einem Polizeitransporter, umringt von festgenommenen weissrussischen Demonstranten.
Die Reporterin berichtete am Sonntag über die Massenproteste in Minsk nach der umstrittenen Präsidentschaftswahl. Doch der Abend endete für sie in einem Gefängnis der weissrussischen Hauptstadt, das sie erst 17 Stunden später wieder verlassen konnte.
Eigentlich will Antonova am Sonntagabend nur zurück in ihr Hotel, doch Polizisten in Schutzanzügen blockieren die Wege. Direkt vor ihr schleudern sie ein junges Paar zu Boden, die Frau schreit, die Beamten prügeln mit Schlagstöcken auf den Mann ein.
«Was wollen Sie hier?»
Als Antonova selbst an der Reihe ist, hilft ihr auch das Vorzeigen der eigens vom weissrussischen Aussenministerium ausgestellten Pressekarte nicht mehr. «Sie sind doch von Afp, was wollen Sie hier? Gehen sie nach Frankreich!», wird die Reporterin stattdessen von einem Beamten angeherrscht - und ebenso wie das Paar zu dem Polizeibus geführt.
Gemeinsam mit neun weiteren Festgenommenen muss Antonova dann in kauernder Position auf dem Boden ausharren. Eine kleine Bewegung reicht, und die Beamten schlagen mit ihren Stöcken zu. Einer ihrer Leidensgenossen ist Asthmatiker. Er keucht, er braucht sein Atmungsgerät, das er jedoch nicht dabei hat. Die Antwort eines Beamten: «Wir werden dir deinen Inhalator mit ins Grab werfen!»
Dutzende Polizeibusse bringen in dieser Nacht nacheinander die Abgeführten auf Polizeiwachen in Minsk, auch lange nachdem die Massenproteste in der Innenstadt vorbei sind. Auf der Wache werden weder Fragen beantwortet, noch werden den Festgenommenen ihre Rechte erklärt.
Zufällig in Kontrollen geraten
Antonova harrt dort mit rund 90 Abgeführten aus. Schnell wird klar, dass viele mit den Protesten nichts zu tun haben, sondern nur zufällig in die Kontrollen geraten sind. Da ist ein Mann, der die Beamten nach einem Geschäft fragte, eine Frau wollte gerade ihren Friseursalon schliessen.
Die Nacht verbringt Antonova mit ihren Leidensgenossen in einem Keller der Polizeiwache. Erst, als nach zwei Stunden eine Frau fragt, weshalb die Festgenommenen eigentlich gequält werden, dürfen sie auf die Toilette.
Ein Mann blutet stark an der Hand, seine Mitgefangenen verarzten ihn notdürftig mit Tüchern. Eigentlich müssten sie nach weissrussischem Gesetz alle nach drei Stunden in Gewahrsam freikommen. Stattdessen werden Fotos gemacht und Fingerabdrücke abgenommen.
Herumgeschubst und beleidigt
Antonova weigert sich schliesslich, ein Protokoll zu unterschreiben, in dem falsche Angaben stehen und ausserdem vermerkt ist, dass sie an den Protesten teilgenommen hat. Sie wird von den Beamten herumgeschubst und beleidigt. «Sie hassen es, wenn man sie ignoriert», sagt eine offenbar erfahrene Beamtin zu ihr.
13 Stunden nach ihrer Festnahme wird sie mit anderen Gefangenen in eine andere Zelle gebracht. Draussen ist es längst hell, doch das Zeitgefühl geht verloren. Durch den Lüftungsschacht ist das Weinen eines Mitgefangenen zu hören.
Zahlreiche weitere Journalisten, vor allem russische und weissrussische Reporter, sind in der Nacht zum Montag festgenommen und inzwischen teils zu mehrtägigen Haftstrafen verurteilt worden, so dass sie Weihnachten und Neujahr hinter Gittern verbringen müssen.
Antonova entgeht einer Verurteilung. Nach 17 Stunden wird sie freigelassen - ebenso wie bei ihrer Festnahme ohne jede Erklärung. Für die Beamten scheint die Sache erledigt zu sein. Einer ruft ihr zum Abschied zu: «Ich hoffe, wir bleiben Freunde!»
(mrs/sda)

description.hltext_display: Arts Council England takes over most MLA functions
description.content:
the Department for Culture, Media and Sport (DCMS) announced that MLA’s largest programme, Renaissance in the Regions (which assists regional museums), would continue. It received a 15% cut, reducing its grant to £43.4m. Tough negotiations then continued between DCMS and the Arts Council over funding for MLA’s other responsibilities.
On 23 November culture minister Ed Vaizey announced that the MLA was “likely” to transfer to the Arts Council, but agreement had still not been reached. The final decision came on 9 December. DCMS promised a total of £46m for MLA’s responsibilities, but deducting the £43.4m for Renaissance leaves only £2.6m to administer cultural property (export licensing, indemnity, acceptance in lieu and security advice), museum accreditation and designation, and the libraries development agenda.
In a separate arrangement with DCMS, the British Museum is to take over the Portable Antiquities Scheme (with a grant of £1.3m a year). An announcement is expected shortly on which organisation will assume responsibility for MLA’s archives role.

event_or_fact.property: the MLA was ?likely? to transfer to the Arts Council, but agreement had still not been reached.

entity.property: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

description.hltext_display: Indien testet atomwaffenfähige Rakete
description.content: Neu Delhi (dpa) - Einen Tag nach Pakistan hat auch Erzrivale Indien wieder atomwaffenfähige Raketen getestet. Die Starts seien erfolgreich verlaufen, sagte ein Sprecher des Verteidigungsministeriums in Neu Delhi. Zwei Boden-Boden-Raketen mit einer Reichweite von 350 Kilometern seien von einem Testgelände an Küste des ostindischen Bundesstaats Orissa abgefeuert worden. Pakistan hatte erst gestern eine atomwaffenfähige Rakete getestet.

description.hltext_display: В Таджикистане будут называть детей согласно "ценностям"
description.content:
Авторы законопроекта утверждают, что они защищают детей
"Родители должны давать красивое имя своему ребенку с учетом национальных ценностей", - говорится в статье нового законопроекта "Об ответственности родителей за воспитание детей", предложенного властями Таджикистана.
Президент страны Эмомали Рахмон поручил вынести законопроект на всенародное обсуждение.
В проекте нет четкого определения, какие имена соответствуют "национальным ценностям", а какие нет, и что конкретно подразумевается под "ценностями", а также не поясняется, кто будет определять ценность имени с точки зрения национальных интересов страны.
Правозащитники считают, что принятое решение является прямым посягательством на свободный выбор родителей и их гражданские права.
Требование или рекомендация?
Авторы закона уверены, что принятие этой статьи обязательно, поскольку нередко родители называют детей не очень подходящими для человека, по мнению законодателей, именами.
Государство не должно вмешиваться в этот процесс. Это единственное право данное нам от Бога
Гульнора
жительница Душанбе
Как правило, обладатели таких экзотических и не всегда звучных имен стараются их поменять, когда становятся взрослыми.
"Это рекомендация родителям, чтобы они давали красивые, звучные имена детям при рождении. Чтобы ребенок, когда подрастет, не чувствовал дискомфорта, называя свое имя. Но выбор остается за родителями. Если мать и отец решили назвать ребенка "топором" или "веником", то никто не будет за это их наказывать. Пункт об именах носит рекомендательный характер, он не предусматривает наказания для родителей", - сказал старший советник президента по правовой политике Хурсандмурод Мирзоев.
Несмотря на комментарии чиновников, предложенные инициативы не встретили ожидаемого всеобщего одобрения.
Данное богом имя
"Естественно, должны соблюдаться традиции, - говорит жительница Душанбе Гульнора. – Но каждый родитель имеет право называть ребенка так, как считает нужным. Государство не должно вмешиваться в этот процесс".
У меня много лет не было детей, а когда родилась дочь, я воздала хвалу Господу и назвала ребенка Шукроной, что значит благодарность Всевышнему
Тахмина
жительница Душанбе
По ее словам, "это единственное право, данное нам от Бога. Беззвучно или звучно – это родительское право", - считает Гульнора.
С ней согласна жительница Душанбе Манижа, чья дочь носит имя, выбранное ей дедом.
"Не думаю, что государство должно регулировать эти вопросы. Это сугубо семейные вопросы. У нас традиционно называют детей бабушки и дедушки. Если я захочу дать своему ребенку европейское или славянское имя, мне никто не может запретить, а государство не имеет право вмешиваться", - сказала Манижа.
Тахмина также уверена, что выбор имени - личное дело родителей.
"У меня, к примеру, много лет не было детей, а когда родилась дочь, я воздала хвалу Господу и назвала ребенка Шукроной, что значит благодарность Всевышнему", - говорит Тахмина.
Однако таджикские политики рекомендуют всерьез отнестись к предлагаемым инициативам.
Меня зовут топор
Выбор имени на Востоке - часть культуры, которая связана с соблюдением национальных традиций и обрядов.
Представьте себе ситуацию: вы знакомитесь с человеком, и он говорит: "Меня зовут топор, или камень, или глина, а еще виноград".
Обладатели столь экзотических для человека имен живут в Таджикистане. Самое интересное, что имена эти вовсе не редкость, они довольно распространены в стране. У каждого необычного имени своя история, свой определенный смысл, рассказывает языковед Сайфиддин Мирзоев.
"Незаметные, некрасивые имена обычно давались, чтобы Бог не забрал дитя. Считалось, что если у ребенка красивое имя, он становится заметнее, а значит - более уязвимым и может умереть", - говорит языковед Сайфиддин Мирзоев.
Имена со смыслом встречаются повсеместно. К примеру, обладательница имени Бастгуль, что в переводе буквально значит "хватит цветов", имеет много сестер, и родители надеются на рождение мальчика.
Если же перед вами Бозгуль, что значит "еще цветов", родителям не хватает девочек. А еще детей в Таджикистане называют в честь умерших предков, цветов, фруктов и даже овощей.
"Фетишизация слов"
Кроме того, в стране немало людей, чьи имена означают дни недели. Таджикский фольклорист Дильшод Рахимов говорит, что такой выбор имен противоречит канонам Ислама, но это очень древняя традиция.
Раньше родители собирали людей, накрывали дастархан, и старец после расспросов о том, что родители ожидают от своего ребенка, как звали его предков, придумывал имя новорожденному
Бозори Толовзод,
востоковед
"Люди, к примеру, полагали, что ряд металлов обладает сверхъестественными свойствами. После фетишизации металлов последовала фетишизация слов. Тогда появились молитвы, заговоры", - рассказал фольклорист Дильшод Рахимов.
Многие семьи в Таджикистане и по сей день обращаются к представителям духовенства за советом. Многие родители уверены - имя определяет судьбу человека.
По шариату новорожденный должен быть наречен в первые семь дней. Это важно, хотя не совсем обязательно. Порой встречаются удивительные имена.
Например, имя Маджнун, которое переводится как "сумасшедший". Или фамилия Зиндадил, что означает "живое сердце".
"В наших семьях в основном родители выбирали имена. Обязательно собирали людей, накрывали дастархан, и старец после расспросов о том, что родители ожидают от своего ребенка, как звали его предков, придумывал имя новорожденному", - поясняет востоковед Бозори Тилавзод.
В мечеть не пустят
Нередко детей называют в честь умерших родственников, особенно дедов и бабушек. Для любой семьи это очень ответственно, поскольку считается, что в малыше живет душа умершего родственника, а потому ругать или повышать голос на ребенка нельзя, потому как перед вами не сын, а дед или папа, не дочь, а бабушка или мама.
Президент Рахмон обязал соответствующие структуры четко расписать правовые нормы, обязанности и ответственность родителей и государственных органов в воспитании детей, и определить механизм выполнения требований закона.
Обсуждаться закон будет в течение двух с половиной месяцев, а потом с учетом замечаний и пожеланий граждан страны доработан и рассмотрен парламентом и правительством страны.
Кроме рекомендаций родителям относительно выбора имен, закон запрещает детям и подросткам посещать религиозные службы, за исключением поминальных, быть членами религиозных обществ и организаций, посещать развлекательные учреждения и компьютерные центры в ночное время суток, смотреть фильмы "непристойного содержания", употреблять спиртные напитки, наркотики и табачные изделия.
За все эти нарушения предусмотрены наказания. Если ребенок был замечен в чем-то незаконном, родителей будут штрафовать, а после многократных нарушений и предупреждений они могут лишиться родительских прав.
Прощание с букварем
За последние несколько лет таджикский лидер Эмомали Рахмон инициировал ряд громких законодательных инициатив, вызвавших неоднозначную реакцию в таджикском обществе.
В рамках программы по сокращению бедности в стране отменили праздники "Прощание с Букварем", "Последний звонок", выпускные вечера, а также рекомендовали гражданам обязательное количество гостей и приглашенных на праздничные, свадебные, религиозные и ритуальные мероприятия.
Кроме того, власти Таджикистана ввели обязательный дресс-код для учителей и учащихся и раскритиковали женщин за ношение ими одежды, "чуждой национальным традициям".
Ранее президент Рахмон призвал соотечественников отказаться от русифицированных окончаний своих фамилий и сам стал Рахмоном, вместо Рахмонова.
Правозащитники и политологи считают, что объявленный правительством страны курс на возвращение к "национальным истокам" есть не что иное, как попытка чиновников отвлечь внимание общественности от нерешенных серьезных социальных проблем.
В стране с 7-миллионным населением более полтора миллиона трудоспособных граждан находятся в эмиграции, а около миллиона человек живут в основном на средства, высылаемые трудовыми мигрантами.

description.hltext_display: Böhr wehrt sich gegen Vorwürfe aus der CDU
只因人户分离领煤火费好难
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯（记者 许前程）市民赵女士住在西城区珠朝街5号院，但她的户口落在阜成门附近的宫门口二条，和她母亲的户口在一起。现在要领煤火费了，赵女士需要开一个住平房无集体供暖设施的证明，可两边儿的居委会都不给她开，无奈她只能拨打北京市非紧急救助服务中心电话12345寻求帮助。
62岁的赵女士说，退休前她在牛街印花厂工作，每年单位都会参照北京市相关规定，给住平房的职工发放煤火费。可自去年她就没领到过这笔费用，就因为她开不出证明来。
昨天下午，记者来到赵女士家，她家所住的平房在待搬迁的区域，屋内烧着一个电暖器，里面确实没有集体供暖设施。她的老伴已瘫痪在床18年了，家里的生活条件不太好。“煤火费是我应得的，不能因为我人户分离就不给我煤火费啊。因为这事我已来回跑了很多趟，精疲力竭。”赵女士说。
为此，记者首先联系了赵女士所在的牛街印花厂。厂长马先生说，印花厂以前是集体所有制企业，2006年12月改制为私营企业。现在北京市规定住平房的居民一个供暖季可领400元煤火费，改制前他们集体企业参照相关规定只发200元的煤火费。改制后，厂子的经济效益不是特别好，仍保持每个供暖季每人发放200元煤火费，但要求职工必须拿到居委会开的证明。至于赵女士这种人户分离的，应该哪头居委会开，他们厂子不管，只要能证明她家无集体供暖设施就可以。
昨天下午，记者与珠朝街5号院所属的陶然亭街道红土店社区取得联系。社区治保主任马先生强调，赵女士的户口不在他们社区，他们没法开证明。尽管赵女士解释自己已在此生活了几十年，和街坊都那么熟，仍无济于事。而宫门口社区居委会工作人员则称，赵女士搬走了，她现在居住的情况他们并不了解，应由居住地的社区开证明更为合适。
为此，记者又与陶然亭街道办事处联系，民政科工作人员称，社区开证明很谨慎的原因在于，有的居民户口在别处，可能别的地方有房产，已领了供暖补贴，这样租的平房就不能再领煤火费了。他们会让红土店社区核实相关情况，再决定是否为赵女士开证明。J198
【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: Facebook Follies: Social networking site snags 2
description.content:
LOCKPORT — If your life’s an open Facebook, some parts are better left unwritten.
That might be the lesson learned by a couple of local newsmakers this year, “made” by their own Facebook accounts.
The social networking tool was the undoing of a fugitive from justice, to the delight of Lockport Police Department. Separately, Facebook made a former Lockport firefighter vulnerable to the criticism that several forms of disability compensation he’s received were not justified.
It didn’t take long for Lockport police to find Christopher Keith Crego after he left the state before being sentenced on several charges in the Fall of 2009.
In February, police learned his whereabouts — in rural Terre Haute, Ind. — after he posted the information on his Facebook account.
“Without criminals like him, we would have never found him,” Lockport police Capt. Rick Podgers said. “He had all of his information right online. He even wrote one time that police were never going to catch him.”
Crego, 40, formerly of Sunset Drive, was wanted on second- and third-degree assault charges on Nov. 22, 2008, after he sent a man to the hospital in a bar fight.
Less than a year later, Lockport police charged Crego again with driving while intoxicated and unlawful possession of marijuana.
When police found he was living in Indiana, they gave District Attorney Michael J. Violante the OK to send the U.S. Marshals in Buffalo to bring Crego back to Lockport.
Upon his arrival back in Lockport in February, Crego was additionally charged with bail jumping and was sent straight to jail on $1 million bail before he was sentenced a month later to more jail time.
Crego, known around the country as the Facebook Fugitive, was showed on local and national news stations across the country including 48 Hours, CBS News and CNN.
On the other hand, Michael A. Collette’s Facebook account didn’t cost him his job as a Lockport city firefighter, but the contents did trigger an investigation that ultimately led to Collette resigning his post this past June.
Collette, a 19-year veteran of Lockport Fire Department, quit just as the city Fire Board was ready to try him on two charges of misconduct.
The firefighter had been off duty on a job-related disability claim, tied to a back injury, since March 2009.
The city’s compensation insurer put a tail on Collette in late spring of that year after an anonymous tipster began e-mailing copies of certain Collette Facebook entries to Mayor Michael Tucker and the US&J. The entries suggested a portrait of a public employee who wasn’t precisely “disabled.”
On Facebook, after he went on sick leave, Collette wrote of buying a home and opening a business in Naples, Fla.; of yachting with friends on the Hudson River and flying to Long Island to take in his young daughter’s violin recital; of parties, tours and limo rides he was enjoying, and of his intention to take a month-long “Great RV Tour” of the western United States.
It was a screen shot of the Great RV itinerary that triggered an private investigator’s look into Collette’s activities while he was out of work on a physician’s note.
Collette never did take that tour; at the time, he said the related entries were just “wishful thinking” on his part. His injury, which he reported sustaining at work the prior autumn, didn’t make him an invalid, he said frustrated; he was trapped by LFD rules prohibiting him from coming back to work in any capacity if he could not fulfill every physical demand of a firefighter including heavy lifting.
Because it questioned the true extent of Collette’s disability, the Tucker administration refused to support his union’s bid to get him a disability retirement. In response, Collette said he looked forward to getting better and getting back to the job he loved.
Six months later, the lieutenant was receiving worker compensation when photos of him playing a role in a feature film turned up. As a security guard in the Keanu Reeves film “Henry’s Crime,” Collette was photographed giving chase to a fleeing bank robbery suspect.
Collette had the legal right to work outside LFD, as long as he reported his earnings to the state for comp deduction purposes.
Still, city officials were irked all over again, this time by the spectacle of a firefighter courting celebrity and getting paid for it, while his absence from fire shift work helped drive LFD overtime expenses.
Fast forward to May 2010, when a worker compensation law judge ruled Collette was no longer eligible for comp benefits. Why exactly is not known; state law prohibits public release of the ruling and calls disclosure of the contents a crime.
Clearly, however, there was a link between that ruling and the fire board’s charges against Collette. The board accused him of making “false statements” to secure disability benefits and behaving in a manner that disgraced the Lockport Fire Department.
Collette resigned from LFD the day before the hearing. He complained bitterly to the US&J that he’d been the victim of city-orchestrated character assassination and was tired of fighting City Hall — so tired, he said, he quit and “gave up a million-dollar pension.”
Or did he?
The city learned in mid-September that the New York state comptroller’s office would grant Collette “performance of duty” disability retirement, which brings a pension at a working fire lieutenant’s full pay until he’s 62 years old, paid roughly half by the state and half by the city. Collette could collect close to $1 million, tax free, over the next 16 years.
On the city’s behalf, state Sen. George Maziarz, R-Newfane, complained to a high-ranking comptroller’s official about an apparent mix-up.
Collette’s retirement award is being reconsidered, Maziarz said earlier this month.
“They did indicate to me, before the election, that it may take a while, but that they were reviewing it,” Maziarz said. “It does seem absurd that someone can quit (his job), then get a pension.”
Contact reporter Britney Milazzo at 439-9222 ext. 6251 or Joyce M. Miles at 439-9222 ext. 6245.

description.hltext_display: US Poised To Approve Nuclear Arms Pact With Russia
description.content:
9 Republicans Say They'll Back Treaty
DESMOND BUTLER, Associate Press
UPDATED: 3:06 am EST December 22, 2010
WASHINGTON -- The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.
The treaty will leave the United States "with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come," Alexander said on the Senate floor.
Republicans had tried to kill the treaty by forcing changes in its language that would have sent it back for negotiations with Moscow. Democrats were working to appease some Republican senators by letting them raise these issues in legislation accompanying the treaty that would not directly affect the treaty.
Most Republicans remained opposed.
"The administration did not negotiate a good treaty," Kyl said. "They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, 'I'm not leaving here until I buy a car.'"
Though Kyl looks likely to vote on the losing side of the debate over the treaty, in his negotiations with the administration he did win Obama's commitment to modernize the remaining nuclear arsenal with projected spending of $85 billion over 10 years.
Some of that money is now in the pipeline, contained in a stopgap government funding bill that cleared Congress on Tuesday. The measure would finance the government, mostly at current levels, through March 4.
It makes an exception for nuclear security programs, allowing the government to spend money to modernize the United States' nuclear arsenal at a rate equal to Obama's $624 million request.

description.hltext_display: Россия-Британия: рецидив прошлого?
description.content:
Глава британского МИД Уильям Хейг подтвердил, что Великобритания и Россия выслали из своих посольств по одному дипломату.
По его словам, 10 декабря британские власти попросили покинуть страну российского дипломата "после получения ясных данных о деятельности российской разведки, противоречащей интересам Великобритании".
"Россия приняла ответные меры 16 декабря, попросив сотрудника нашего посольства покинуть территорию страны", - сообщил Хейг.
Подобные инциденты в отношениях Москвы и Лондона происходят не впервые и имеют во многом историческую подоплеку.
Об этом в программе "Утро на Би-би-си" рассуждает главный редактор сайта agentura.ru, обозреватель "Новой газеты" Андрей Солдатов.

description.hltext_display: Hedge Funds Side Pocket
description.author: Richard Wilson
description.content:
Firm Trying To Price Hedge Fund Side Pockets Side pockets are estimated to account for 10% of the $1.8 trillion in total hedge fund assets. Now, a firm that specializes in creating secondary markets for hedge fund shares is trying to create a market to open up these side pockets.
Hedge fund investors stuck in side pockets, those opaque segregated accounts, may be able to buy some clarity.
A new service started by Hedgebay, an outfit that makes secondary markets for hedge fund stakes, is trying to put a price tag on those hard-to-value side pockets. By creating a system, the financial firm hopes to bolster trading in these types of assets.
“There’s a lack of information and transparency for this type of illiquid asset,” says Elias Tueta, a co-founder at Hedgebay. “More informed investors will be more willing to trade.”
Side pockets aren’t new. Hedge fund managers typically use them to set aside thinly traded investments they think will appreciate over time — say, shares in the privately held Facebook. Source

description.hltext_display: Audiovisuel extérieur : le CE de RFI demande la désignation d'un administrateur provisoire
description.content:
krentet Alain de Pouzilhac, respectivement directrice générale déléguée et PDG de la chaîne France 24, se livrent une guerre de position tout en faisant face à la défiance de leurs salariés.AFP/JEAN AYISSI,THOMAS COEX
Estimant "triste et désolant le spectacle que donnent leurs dirigeants depuis leur nomination", le comité d'entreprise de RFI a demandé mardi 21 décembre à la justice de désigner un administrateur provisoire pour remplacer Alain de Pouzilhac et Christine Ockrent, numéros un et deux de l'Audiovisuel extérieur de la France (AEF), qui coiffe la chaîne de télévision France 24 et la station de radio RFI.
"L'actuelle guerre des chefs paralyse l'entreprise et nuit gravement à l'image de l'AEF et de ses filiales", considèrent les élus SNJ, FO, SNRT-CGT et SNJ-CGT du comité d'entreprise dans un communiqué. "Les élus de l'intersyndicale (…) ont saisi le tribunal de commerce pour faire remplacer la direction par un administrateur provisoire chargé de rétablir une gestion normale de l'entreprise", écrivent-ils.
Christine Ockrent, déjà désavouée par l'ensemble des cadres dirigeants et le personnel de France 24, se refuse à quitter ses fonctions, laissant au gouvernement le soin de trancher dans le conflit qui l'oppose à son patron Alain de Pouzilhac. La chaîne d'informations internationales en continu est secouée par une affaire d'espionnage informatique impliquant notamment une proche collaboratrice de Mme Ockrent, Candice Marchal.
"PION SUR L'ÉCHIQUIER"
Interviewée par le quotidien Libération(lien payant), cette dernière réfute ces accusations et justifie ses agissements sur les serveurs informatiques de la chaîne par un "harcèlement quotidien" : "Je cherchais un organigramme, une ligne budgétaire me concernant", explique-t-elle. "Pion sur l'échiquier", elle estime que "ce n'est pas [elle] qu'on vise, mais Ockrent".
Son avocat annonce dans les colonnes du journal avoir l'intention de déposer trois plaintes : la première pour des manœuvres effectuées sur le disque dur de Mme Marchal, la seconde pour atteinte au secret de la correspondance — "Le Monde et Marianne ont eu accès à des mails de Candice Marchal à Christine Ockrent" —, la troisième pour violation du secret professionnel.

description.hltext_display: Stunning Blues: A Style Statement This Season
description.content:
When it comes to fashion trends, one particular trend is mostly followed – warm hues for fall and winter and cool hues for the warmer months. This season things are little different. Along with the usual warmer tones, what is a rather big hit this season are cool and stunning hues of blue. All the admirers of blue are in for some good news and can safely flaunt their favourite tone this season. While most shades of blue look really fabulous, it is the stunning shades of blue such as electric blue that is a hot trend this season.
New Year's Eve parties are just around the corner and what can be better than stylish outfits in stunning blues. The very nature of the color blue evokes a sense of sophistication and style. Thus it doesn't take much to make a blue outfit look stylish because it invariably always is. Stylish Designer Indian Sarees such as Designer Saree, Designer Lehenga Saree, Designer Butterfly Pallu Sarees, Designer Ready Pleated Sarees can look unbelievably chic. On the contrary, women not very comfortable in Sarees can always opt for Churidar Suits, Anarkali Suits, trendy Designer Kurtis in stunning blues can be equally fashionable. While electric blue is a hot trend this season, the drawback of this color is that it flatters women having fairer skin tones. However that doesn't mean that women having wheatish and dusky skin tones need to lose heart. They can opt for Designer outfits in much flattering deep teal blue. Additionally, deep teal blue or electric blue Designer outfits featuring black accents are definitely the pinnacle of style and sophistication. On the other hand, for a glamorous look dazzling embellishments in silver such as silver sequins, beads, zardozi coupled with sparkling stones are the accents. Such a glamorous blue Designer outfit accessorized with silver, white gold or platinum jewellery would make heads turn at New Year Eve's party!

description.hltext_display: Toyota will pay $32.4M in fines
description.content:
TOKYO Toyota Motor Corp. has agreed to pay the U.S. government a record $32.4 million in additional fines to settle an investigation into its handling of two recalls at the heart of its safety crisis. The civil penalties will settle investigations into how Toyota dealt with recalls over accelerator pedals that could get trapped in floor mats and steering relay rods that could break and lead to drivers losing control.
The latest settlement, on top of a $16.4 million fine Toyota paid earlier in a related investigation, brings the total penalties levied on the company to $48.8 million. It caps a difficult year for the world's No. 1 automaker, which recalled more than 11 million vehicles globally since the fall of 2009 as it scrambled to protect its reputation for safety and reliability.
The company said it agreed to the penalties without admitting to any violations of U.S. laws. However, that does not free Toyota from potential civil and criminal penalties in private lawsuits and other federal investigations.
Steve St. Angelo, Toyota's chief quality officer for North America, said in a statement that the company has "worked very hard over the past year to put these issues behind us and set a new standard of responsiveness to our customers. These agreements are an opportunity to turn the page to an even more constructive relationship with NHTSA (National Highway Traffic Safety Administration)."
He said Toyota was grateful to its customers for "their confidence in the quality and reliability of our vehicles."
In April, Toyota agreed to pay the maximum fine allowed under law for a single case $16.4 million for failing to promptly alert U.S. regulators to safety problems over sticking accelerator pedals. Under federal law, automakers must notify the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration within five days of determining that a safety defect exists and promptly conduct a recall.
At the time, Toyota denied attempting to hide a safety defect and said it agreed to the penalty to avoid a lengthy legal battle with the government.
Brand loyalty suffers
Jesse Toprak, vice president of industry trends and insight at TrueCar, an automotive consulting firm in Santa Monica, Calif., said Toyota was trying to put its recalls behind it at a time when the company's U.S. sales have been flat while many rivals have taken advantage of a recovering auto landscape.
"It's going to be a far lengthier process. Consumer loyalty is not what it used to be. The choices are plentiful now," he said.
Mizuho Investors Securities auto analyst Ryoichi Saito described the payment as part of the company's efforts to regain customer confidence.
"It is one positive step forward for the company to move on from the recall crisis," he said.

description.hltext_display: Ötzi gyomorbaktériumait vizsgálják svéd kutatók
description.author: hvg@hvg.hu
description.content:
Ötzi, az 5300 éves gleccsermúmia gyomorbaktériumait vizsgálják svéd kutatók, a tudósok reményei szerint e kutatások új antibiotikumok kifejlesztését teszik majd lehetővé. /* hvg.hu - 200x200 A */ A jégember múmiáját, amelyet a bolzanói régészeti múzeumban őriznek, november 8-án több ország kutatói vizsgálták órákon keresztül. E kutatók egyike Lars Engstrand, a Karolinska Intézet bakteriológusprofesszora volt, akinek fő kutatási területe a gyomorfekélyt okozó Helicobacter pylori - olvasható Lars Engstrand német és francia kutatókkal együtt először egy endoszkópot kísérelt meg levezetni Ötzi gyomrába, ám miután próbálkozásaik kudarcot vallottak, egy 10 centiméter széles nyílást vágtak a jégember hasfalába. Mintát vettek a gyomortartalomból, valamint 20 szövetmintát Ötzi gyomrából és vastagbeléből, valamint a fogkörüli szövetből. Az elemzést a svéd Járványtani Intézetben, valamint a Karolinska Intézetben végezték.� � Fotó: AP Annika Fahlén molekuláris biológus a múlt héten kezdte el a gyomorbaktérium vizsgálatát, s mint a lap kiemeli, a� kezdeti eredmények igen biztatóak. Épségben fennmaradt a baktériumok DNS-e, így a kutatók, összevetve az eredményeket a modernkori adatbázisokat,� képesek meghatározni, hogy halálakor milyen kórokozók tenyésztek a jégember gyomrában.� A kutatók kimetszettek néhány darabot Ötzi gyomornyálkahártyájából is, így megállapítható, hogy szenvedett-e gyomorhurutban.
A svéd kutatók szerint a vizsgálatokat márciusra fejezik be, s ha minden a tervek szerint halad, az eredményeket még a nyár folyamán, Ötzi megtalálásának 20. évfordulója előtt sikerül tudományos folyóiratokban közreadni.� Lars Engstrand reményei szerint az elemzések három kérdést segítenek megválaszolni: milyen volt az 5300 évvel ezelőtt élt Ötzi gyomor- és bélflórája, hordozta-e a gyomorfekélyt kiváltó kórokozót, s vannak-e rezisztens baktériumok a jégember gyomrában?� Mint Engstrand professzor rámutat, a rezisztensségért felelős gének kimutatása a baktériumban nagy jelentőséggel bírna, hiszen a felfedezés hozzájárulna hatékonyabb antibiotikumok kifejlesztéséhez.� "Ötzit vizsgálva hozzájárulna az antibiotikumokkal szembeni rezisztencia folyamatának megértéséhez" - fogalmazott Lars Engstrand, hozzátéve, hogy eddig még sohasem vizsgálhattak a kutatók 5300 éves emberi szövetmintákat� "Azt akarjuk megvizsgálni, hogy miként alkalmazkodtak a gének, miután a baktériumok az antibiotikumokkal találták szembe magukat" - hangsúlyozta Engstrand professzor.

description.hltext_display: Highly capable kids left behind
description.content:
As a parent of a highly capable student and as a resident of Marysville, I find it disheartening that opportunities for bright, curious, motivated students in Washington’s public schools are threatened by the state government in its latest round of proposed budget cuts.
The governor has just proposed to eliminate all state highly capable program funding for the next two years. This is the third time she’s made such a proposal. Her last attempt was rebuffed by the Legislature during the just completed special session last week. The only way she can legally do this is if the Legislature suspends implementation of ESHB 2261.
Highly capable programming is not something extra to be funded only when times are good.
Some key issues in Washington are:
Full funding of highly capable programs in the 2011-2013 budget.
Full implementation of the education reforms promised in ESHB 2261 beginning in September 2011. Under ESHB 2261, highly capable program services will become a mandated part of basic education. This places them within the protections of basic education regarding funding, and it is vital that implementation proceed as scheduled.
Highly capable programs are an essential part of securing Washington’s economic future. This is a high-tech state and gifted programs are the place where STEM (science, technology, engineering and math) talents are best nurtured. Funding highly capable programming is an investment in our state’s future.
Gifted education isn’t about sporadic programming options applied inconsistently for a few fortunate high-ability children. Research shows successful gifted education is about finding ways for children to learn on a daily basis, to grow, stretch and exercise the minds of children from all types of backgrounds, cultures and experiences.
Our children’s futures are at stake here.

description.hltext_display: VERSO IL TOUR
description.author: redazione@tgcom.it (Redazione TGCOM
description.content:
Amoroso presenta tour su Italia 1
Dalla vittoria ad Amici è cresciuta. Ma a dispetto dei 600mila dischi venduti, Alessandra Amoroso ha ancora la spontaneità della 24enne di Galatina. La cantante presenta l'anteprima del nuovo tour ("Il mondo in un secondo tour") in partenza dal 12 marzo. E a Natale Italia 1 trasmetterà in prima serata lo show al Mediolanumforum di Assago del 22 dicembre. Ora le manca solo Sanremo: "Lo guarderò da casa".
Due anteprime curatissime, quella di Roma del 21 dicembre e di Milano del 22 (già venduti 8mila biglietti), arricchite di un'inedita parentesi acustica e coreografie di Daniel Ezralow, in cui la Amoroso interpreta tutte le sue hit e qualche cover. "Sento la responsabilità verso la gente - dice la cantante durante al presentazione a Roma -. Mi capita anche quando canto in piazza. Poi però salgo sul palco e passa tutto".
Da quando Federico Moccia ha scelto "Senza nuvole" come colonna sonora di "Amore 14", Alessandra è diventata, ancor di più, la voce di una generazione. Nella Capitale, ad ascoltarla in platea c'erano anche Marco Mengoni, Emma Marrone (vincitori di "X Factor" e dell'ultimo "Amici") e Maria De Filippi, "ormai per me come una mamma".
A tanto successo manca solo il Festival di Sanremo, dove Alessandra è andata lo scorso anno, ma come ospite di Valerio Scanu nella serata dei duetti. "Chissà, chi vivrà vedrà. La tv, però, non mi piace molto - risponde lei -. Lavorare con Morandi è stato bellissimo, ma lo guarderò da casa. Magari lo chiamerò il giorno prima, come ogni tanto fa lui con me".

We are getting back into realizing the true value of a dollar and if it takes a little bartering to get that new purse for us then we know how to work a deal. The Louis Vuitton bags are authentic, they have check points they must meet to make sure no one is getting a bad deal.
No one wants that and that is not what shopbellabag.com is in business to do to you. When it comes time to find that sweet little black bag to go with the little black dress you know every woman should have in their closet go to shopbellabag.com and check out what is waiting for you to pick up today. There is new merchandise coming in all the time and there is more than one way to shopbellabag.com and everyone enjoys choices. Look at it and realize it will make someone's day when they are able to pick it up for that special outfit they are trying to complete for that special occasion.

description.hltext_display: NLA donates to homeless centre
description.content:
The National Landlords Association has donated £3,000 to Crisis to help provide hot food and warmth to homeless people in Newcastle on Christmas Day and Boxing Day.
The donation to Crisis, the national charity for single homeless people, will help the organisation to keep open its Christmas Centre in Newcastle during the festive period. The Christmas Centres provide a wide range of essential services for homeless people with the London centres alone taking in approximately 2500 guests.
David Salusbury, chairman, NLA, said: “The National Landlords Association is proud to support Crisis, the national charity for single homeless people. The festive period can be a lonely and difficult time for homeless people and Crisis does an incredibly important job in alleviating some of the loneliness and, importantly, ensuring they are kept warm during the cold winter days and nights.”
The Crisis Christmas Centre in Newcastle will be open from Christmas Eve to Boxing Day.

event_or_fact.property: ?The National Landlords Association is proud to support Crisis, the national charity for single homeless people

description.hltext_display: China bans foreign words in local media
中关村壹号今日开工
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯 今天上午，在海淀北部中关村壹号项目地块，海淀北部研发服务和高新技术产业聚集区产业功能区启动，中关村壹号等重点工程同时开工。
作为北部地区先行启动的重点区域，此次永丰、稻香湖两大产业功能区共集中启动三个地块和六个二级项目，三个地块项目包括翠湖科技园的A地块项目和永丰新材料功能区的A、E地块及市政配套道路工程建设项目，六个二级项目包括中关村壹号、永丰基地航天电子(600879,股吧)项目、爱博精电项目、佳讯飞鸿项目、北斗航项目和清华附中永丰分校。
中关村壹号项目拟规划建筑面积约70万平方米（地上部分）。按照规划，中关村壹号建筑群将建设核心总部聚集区、快速成长企业加速区和产业服务配套区三个功能区。项目建成后，预计将有200多家大型科技企业和快速成长企业入驻，就业人数两万人，入驻企业总收入240亿元至300亿元。
清华附中永丰分校位于北清路百旺杏林湾项目西北侧，总面积达29023平方米，投资1.46个亿，拥有标准运动场与各类实验室，即将建成的学校将设置36个班级，招收学生人数达1500人左右，计划2012年年底竣工并交付使用。
据统计，截至9月底，海淀北部地区共完成开发建设投资72.5亿元，比去年同期增长42%。

description.author: Av: unt.se, TT
description.content: Riksväg 72 från Uppsala till Järlåsa är den vägsträcka som fångat flest fartsyndare från januari till oktober i år. 3 043 bilister körde för fort på sträckan. Det visar statistik som SVT:s Rapport tagit del av.Den enskilda fartkamera som fångat flest är en kamera på E 4 vid Hörnefors i Västerbotten som satte dit 1 354 fortkörare.Men målet är inte att sätta fast så många som möjligt.- Det är hastigheten vi är ute efter, inte folks pengar, säger trafiksäkerhetsdirektör Claes Tingvall. Av: unt.se, TT

description.hltext_display: Gift to WSU aids global health
description.content:
Concerning the Friday letter regarding the recent gifts of Paul Allen and Bill Gates to Washington State University “for cats and dogs,” perhaps a broader perspective should be provided regarding these gifts. (“Allen, Gates could refocus efforts.”)
Approximately 70 percent of human infections are transmitted from animals to humans. In third world countries — or, more accurately, in the lower tier of emerging countries of the world — animal health is the key to increased economic viability as well as human health for its citizens. To address this issue, WSU has established its School for Global Animal Health. Integrating WSU’s preeminent expertise in fields such as veterinary medicine, agriculture, engineering and bio-technology, they are emerging as a world leader in the research and dissemination of information concerning animal health and related human health issues. (Think mad cow disease, avian flu, etc).
The Allen gift is obviously a key to furthering the work of this school, which leads a team of researchers spread across the globe in participating universities and national research facilities.
It’s about a whole lot more than “cats and dogs”!
Robert Grossman
Camano Island
