description.hltext_display: 南六环将建养老院可容纳千位老人
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯 记者昨天从民政局获悉，一所拥有千张床位的养老院将落户南六环。目前该养老院已经进入筹备阶段，明年有望建成。
市民政局新闻发言人李新京表示，2009年和2010年，北京每年都建设养老床位1.5万张以上。明年春节前后，北京市第一社会福利院将增设660张床位，比原来的550张增加一倍还多。明年还有望在南六环建设一所养老院，预计养老床位1000张。目前发改委已经完成论证，养老院进入筹备阶段。

description.hltext_display: Black Swan
description.content:
" " follows the story of Nina, a ballerina in a New York City ballet company whose life, like all those in her profession, is completely consumed with dance. When artistic director Thomas Leroy decides to replace prima ballerina Beth MacIntyre for the opening production of their new season, "Swan Lake," he narrows his choices to Nina and a new dancer, Lily. "Swan Lake" requires a dancer who can play both the White Swan with innocence and grace, and the Black Swan, who represents guile and sensuality. Nina fits the White Swan role perfectly but Lily is the personification of the Black Swan. As the two young dancers expand their rivalry, Nina becomes dangerously more in touch with her dark side.
Tags: There are no tags.

description.hltext_display: Stylish office clothes
description.content: Corporate Dress Code - one of the most elegant and sometimes grotesque styles. Typically, preference is given to the development of corporate identity specialists in the industry, as corporate identity must embody and modern women's fashion trends, and comfort and beauty, but most importantly - to bring others, including customers, the philosophy of a particular organization, its methods work and the basic principles.Stylish office dress FLANMARK.com is an original face of the company, so it should display the employee and his employer in the most favorable light to others. It is unacceptable or office dress uniforms, which are made of poor quality or cheap materials, as well as the dirtiness worker in dealing with office clothes. When working clients first draw attention on employee clothing, since it can help a lot to learn about us without words - as an employer to treat its employees as its staff courteous when performing tasks and faithful to his idea.Therefore, the basic rules to remember, employers and employees in developing a style of corporate clothing and its use is the colors of uniforms and careful application of accessories.Colors and style of corporate clothing should allocate an employee from the crowd of ordinary people, but do not cut the eye with their brightness or tasteless. The scope of work in choosing the style of corporate clothing also plays a big role - for example, if the company specializes in working with finance, law, the working clothes should be as close to the classic business style, and have a minimum of accessories, you can simply use cuff links, watches, badge. With respect to color clothes should remember about the rule of "two colors" - they provide a strict dress code and proper attitude to the customer - a serious and thoughtful.Quality corporate clothing and is one of the parts by which the first case when meeting with a representative drew attention to a potential client. You should not go to extremes - too expensive to buy uniforms or vice versa, trying to save her. Also worth thinking about the completeness of corporate clothing - that is to consider the conditions under which the employee would have found and from this point of view to evaluate thermal conductivity and density of the clothes. Most-favored few sets of clothing - demi-season, summer and winter. Having multiple sets of clothing FLANMARK.com to help an employee keep their valuable business skills at all times and worry only about the problems of the client, and about their appearance, wellbeing and self-esteem.The style of corporate clothing should distinguish between the company managers and ordinary employees. That is, of course, style of dress is left alone, but at the expense of small differences, for example, the presence of a jacket or vest, some sort of enhancement will help the client to determine with whom he is currently talking to.As a result, corporate clothing is not just determining whether an employee to a particular firm or industry, it forms the spirit of unity in a collective sense of belonging to a category, feel helps employees and customers more comfortable and, of course, helps in achieving success in certain industry. That is why the development of corporate-style clothing is one of the most important moments in the activities of any company that needs to be done in the best possible way and with all the modern trends.http://www.flanmark.com

description.hltext_display: U.S. citizens 'more likely to die on Christmas Day'
description.content:
U.S. citizens 'more likely to die on Christmas Day'
Britain News.Net
U.S. citizens are more likely to die on Christmas Day than any other time of the year, according to a new study.
Analysis of U.S. death certificates between 1979 and 2004 found an extra 42,325 natural deaths in the two weeks starting with Christmas above the usual seasonal winter increase, reports the Daily Mail.
Researchers at the University of California said that mortality in general increased over the holidays, and deaths in hospitals rose dramatically on Christmas Day and New Year's Day.
The study found that more people died on hospital wards, or had died before arrival, on the public holidays than on any other days of the year.
Possible explanations behind the spike in deaths include overcrowding in emergency departments, winter travel, cold weather and substance abuse.
In an article in the Social Science and Medicine journal. (ANI)
Have your say on this story

description.hltext_display: 本月将开通5条地铁3条路
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
本报讯（记者刘冕 张楠）地铁房山线、大兴线、15号线首开段、昌平线、亦庄线及蒲黄榆路、阜石路二期、温榆河大道工程都将于本月开通。据房山区交通局介绍，地铁房山线即将开通，但尚不能与其他地铁线直接换乘。为此，房山线大葆台站将开通公交专线，市民可换乘至大兴线新宫站，换乘不需二次计费。
房山区交通部门安排了37条公交线分别接驳房山线。其中，除了917支3外，其余均为区域公交线。调整后的大部分公交线将与房山线接驳1至3次。各条接驳线路中，临1路为新开线路，从大葆台站发车，走葆台路向东，至丰葆路向北，至南四环路向东，至马家堡西路向南，返回绕公益东桥掉头，直达大兴线新宫站，中途不设站。该线将采取多车连发的方式，迅速“消化”地铁带来的大客流。乘客从房山线大葆台站下来，乘坐临1路专线换乘大兴线新宫站，不再二次计费。虽然再次进地铁站还需刷卡，但采用的专用换乘刷卡闸机不进行二次计费。
除了房山线，大兴线、15号线首开段、昌平线、亦庄线本月也将开通试运营，打通北京城市中心区与郊区的交通瓶颈。全市轨道交通新增里程110多公里。一次开通如此大规模的轨道线路，在国内尚属首次。
2007年以前，北京只有4条轨道线，日客运量不足200万人次。目前，北京市拥有9条线路，在市区内已经逐渐成网，日客运量达600万人次左右，轨道交通逐步成为市区主要交通方式。随着年内5条新线的开通，更多新城居民进出城区时间将缩短到1小时以内，“准时准点”的轨道交通将吸引一批“弃车族”的加入。
另外，新线各站外几乎都设置了自行车停放点，部分站点还设置了P+R停车场，乘客凭当天市政交通一卡通卡乘坐公共交通记录，可享受停车费优惠政策。
本月，蒲黄榆路、阜石路二期、温榆河大道工程将建成通车，届时将为城南、城西、城东各增添一条安全、高速、便捷的交通通道。以蒲黄榆路为例，它将成为连接南四环路和南五环路的又一条南北向放射性快速交通干道，承担起中心城区联系南苑、大兴东南部地区以及大兴新城、亦庄新城的交通服务功能。
为了给行人提供方便，刘家窑立交桥改造和新建的航天城高架桥都专门配建了公交港湾及人行步梯，既方便换乘也充分发挥疏堵功能。其中改建后的刘家窑立交桥，东西南北方向将各设一个人行步梯直接与地铁5号线刘家窑站四个出入口对接，三环主路的公交车在桥上停靠后，乘客能直接下到辅路换乘地铁。

description.hltext_display: 元器件交易网启动e查货 重拳出击整顿库存
description.content:
元器件交易网正式启动e查货，奖罚措施严明，可谓力度空前，重拳出击。
为保证网站所有会员现货库存及普通库存的真实性，让采购商检索到更准确的产品信息，元器件交易网专门成立查货小组，正式启动持久的e查货行动。
对象：元器件交易网供应商会员：50强、现货排名会员、实体认证会员、普通会员;
目的：让元器件交网的库存最真，以此提升采购商对网站和商家的认同感;
范围：现货库存、普通库存;
途径：官方抽查、商家申请。
加入e查货的好处
1.对已查实的IC库存在搜索结果页增加“已查”标识;
2.“已查”标识=IC真有货，体现商家现货实力，引导采购商优先选择;
3.“已查”标识=官方已查实，吸引采购商放心选择;
4.首页专栏展示已查实的IC库存型号;
5.对查货通过的供应商进行全方位推广，如首页焦点图、资讯、会员中心等。
处罚
相符率低于90%的商家，将扣减现货条数，具体如下表：
如何恢复被扣除的现货条数
1.投诉其他供应商标注的虚假热卖价格信息，经核查投诉属实，增加投诉方现货条数：50强、现货排名会员每次增加100条，实体认证会员每次增加40条，普通会员每次增加10条，增加总条数以被扣除条数为上限。
2.商机通邀请好友，并且对方成功开通，邀请方除获赠20分钟话费外，同时增加现货条数：50强、现货排名会员成功邀请一位好友增加100条，实体认证会员成功邀请一位好友增加40条，普通会员成功邀请一位好友增加10条，增加总条数以被扣除条数为上限。
3.提交查货申请，50强、现货排名会员每次申请上限50条，实体认证会员每次申请上限20条，普通会员每次申请上限为5条，如查实通过，相应增加50条、20条、5条现货，申请总条数以被扣除条数为上限。
奖励
对于相符率100%的商家
1.50强、现货排名会员
（1）首页焦点图广告一周
（2）首页资讯推介一篇
（3）采购商/供应商会员中心消息推介
（4）采购商会员邮件群发两期，每期20000封
（5）北京、深圳、西安三地6台广告机一周（北京中发电子市场1台、新中发电子市场2台、知春电子城1台、深圳新亚洲一期1台、西安电子大楼1台）
2.实体认证会员
（1）增加现货条数100条
（2）首页资讯推介一篇
（3）采购商/供应商会员中心消息推介
（4）采购商会员邮件群发一期，每期20000封
（5）北京4台广告机一周（中发电子市场1台、新中发电子市场2台、知春电子城1台）
3.普通会员
（1）增加现货条数30条
（2）首页资讯推介一篇

description.hltext_display: DAX erreicht neue Höchststände
NLA donates to homeless centre
description.content:
The National Landlords Association has donated £3,000 to Crisis to help provide hot food and warmth to homeless people in Newcastle on Christmas Day and Boxing Day.
The donation to Crisis, the national charity for single homeless people, will help the organisation to keep open its Christmas Centre in Newcastle during the festive period. The Christmas Centres provide a wide range of essential services for homeless people with the London centres alone taking in approximately 2500 guests.
David Salusbury, chairman, NLA, said: “The National Landlords Association is proud to support Crisis, the national charity for single homeless people. The festive period can be a lonely and difficult time for homeless people and Crisis does an incredibly important job in alleviating some of the loneliness and, importantly, ensuring they are kept warm during the cold winter days and nights.”
The Crisis Christmas Centre in Newcastle will be open from Christmas Eve to Boxing Day.

event_or_fact.property: ?The National Landlords Association is proud to support Crisis, the national charity for single homeless people

description.hltext_display: 出租车面临调价窗口
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
今天零时起，汽油、柴油价格再次上调。其中，汽油价格每吨提高310元，柴油价格每吨提高300元，测算到零售价格90号汽油和0号柴油全国平均每升分别提高0.23元和0.26元。
京城汽油价格达到历史最高水平。人们常用的93号汽油售价从之前的6.92元/升涨至7.17元/升；97号汽油售价涨至7.63元/升；98号汽油售价8.18元/升；0号柴油售价7.14元/升。
说法
提油价经过慎重考虑
7月份以来，受国内外多种因素影响，国内价格总水平上涨较快。国家发改委负责人称，在这种情况下，国家仍然坚持按现行价格机制提高国内成品油价格是经过慎重考虑的，目的是坚持资源性产品价格形成机制改革的方向，调动企业生产和进口积极性，保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。理顺成品油价格，短期内会对下游用油行业产生一定影响，但长远有利于保持国民经济的健康可持续发展。
追访
部分加油站暂不调价
今天上午记者从本市部分外资、民营加油站获悉，他们中有的不同程度动态上调了油价，但同时基本保持动态优惠幅度范围和调价之前差不多的程度；有的则还没有着急变动价格。比如中华道达尔昌平加油站，在官方93号油的油价是6.92元/升时，给出的优惠价是6.52元/升，在官方油价上调为7.17元/升时，他们今天给出的最新优惠价是6.77元/升，前后大概都是约优惠4角。而记者从壳牌方面了解到，他们各加油站的油价目前还“按兵不动”，93号油依旧保持比之前6.92元/升时优惠2角到3角的价格，今后几天是否调价视情况再定。
期
根据本市去年年底出台的出租汽车租价与油价的联动机制，本市出租车价格同样面临着“调价窗口期”。记者从首汽等出租车公司了解到，目前他们还未接到调价方面的政策。记者从北京市发改委了解到，今天上午，北京市发改委已经开始针对此事开会进行研究。截至记者发稿时，暂时还没有具体方案出台。
据了解，出租汽车租价与油价的联动机制明确规定，当北京市93号汽油价格在4.26元/升(不含)至6.50元/升(含)区间变动时，由政府与企业向出租汽车驾驶员发放临时燃油补贴，承担油价变动影响；当北京市93号汽油价格在6.50元/升(不含)至7.10(含)元/升区间时，在由政府和企业向出租车驾驶员发放临时燃油补贴的基础上，加收乘距超过基价公里乘客1.00元/运次的燃油附加费；当北京市93号汽油价格超过7.10元/升时，按照程序研究调整租价，租价调整后取消燃油附加费。 本报记者 张楠 孟环
有话要说
已经改坐公交了
陈志国：又一个无可奈何的消息，我们已经审美疲劳了！看来物价又有涨价的理由了！
解威：真是没有什么可以说的了。
包思：幸亏我还有脚，走路不交钱吧？
乐纳德：把涨价赚的钱投入到治堵中。
蒋志伟：昨晚10点去了3个加油站都排队。
谷蕾：还好我没买车。
寇琪：能涨到二环上车流量减半就好了。
曹成勋：能不能让百姓的生活质量先跟国际接轨，其他的慢点接轨我看是可以的。
王建涛：开车就别怕涨价，不然就坐公交。
李尚：已经改乘公交车了。
穷开心：油价越高越好，最好超过50元一升，那样北京就不会堵车了。
【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: 'No new taxes' leaves us naked
description.content:
Your Dec. 15 article, “Money for poor, education, health slashed in Gregoire’s budget” reveals the sad truth about popular anti-tax initiatives.
Simplistic “no new taxes” policies, which majorities of us support, are like the emperor’s new clothes.
While some praise these policies as victories for the people, many of us now see that they leave us, not the initiative’s sponsor, naked.
Well, maybe not all of us and maybe not actually naked, but they leave us stripped of the Basic Health Plan for 66,000 working poor; stripped of the Disability Lifeline for thousands of disabled poor, stripped of smaller classes and teachers’ aides for our children, stripped of security officers on our streets and in our prisons, stripped of support for our state parks, and the list goes on.
We all favor careful, responsible budgeting and tough, effective monitoring of how our taxes are spent. This budget plan should show us that we need new taxes, including especially a progressive state income tax (which means people pay fairly, proportionate to their income).
Will any leaders come forward courageously now and speak this truth?

description.hltext_display: Emphasize the dignity of his clothes
description.content:

description.hltext_display: 百度诉“360”不正当竞争 一审获赔38.5万
description.content:
昨天上午，百度诉360不正当竞争一案在北京市二中院有了一审结果。法院一审认定奇智软件（北京）有限公司和北京三际无限网络科技有限公司的行为构成不正当竞争，判决二公司停止侵权，刊登声明以消除影响，赔偿原告北京百度网讯科技有限公司以及百度时代网络技术（北京）有限公司经济损失及诉讼合理支出共计38.5万元。
360“恶评插件”锁定百度
原告诉称，今年3月初，两被告在其360安全卫士7.0软件版本中，将两原告共同经营的百度工具栏和百度地址栏两款软件定义为“恶评插件”，并描述为“此类插件具有恶意行为，可能会危害您的电脑，建议您立即清理”。按照360安全卫士之提示进行操作可以在默认情况下删除该两款软件，且两被告在www.360.cn网站将该软件描述为“具有强制安装，自身无法正常卸载”。
同年7月，原告又收到网民举报，两被告在其最新升级后的360安全卫士7.3beta版不但继续对百度工具栏和地址栏进行恶意贬损和诋毁行为，而且在“360杀毒”和“查杀木马”功能中，将该两款软件作为“病毒查杀”，并描述两软件对用户电脑构成“安全威胁”，用户按照360杀毒默认设置，即可卸载百度工具栏和地址栏软件。

description.hltext_display: Modest N.C. economic recovery forecast in '11
Mangkir dari Sidang, Pegawai Pemprov Jawa Timur Ditahan
description.content:
TEMPO Interaktif, SIDOARJO - Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Negeri Sidoarjo, dalam sidangnya Rabu (22/12), menetapkan penahanan terhadap Leksono Wibowo. Terdakwa kasus korupsi dana reboisasi hutan mangrove tersebut dua kali mangkir untuk hadir dalam persidangan.
Usai sidang, Jaksa Penuntut Umum Bambang Purwadi langsung melaksanakan perintah majelis hakim. Leksono yang juga pegawai Dinas Peternakan Pemerintah Provinsi Jawa Timur itu dijebloskan ke dalam tahanan Lembaga Pemasyarakat Sidoarjo.
Juru bicara Pengadilan Negeri Sidoarjo Sri Rahayu menjelaskan, majelis hakim memutuskan terdakwa ditahan karena dikhawatirkan terdakwa melarikan diri saat majelis hakim memvonis perkara tersebut. "Majelis hakim tak mau ambil resiko," katanya.
Sidang pada Rabu siang tadi beragendakan pembacaan tuntutan jaksa. Menurut jaksa, terdakwa terbukti melakukan tindak pidana korupsi dan dituntut hukuman satu tahun enam bulan penjara serta denda Rp 5 juta subsider enam bulan kurungan.
Terdakwa dijerat dengan pasal 3 Undang-Undang Pemberantasan Tindak Pidana Korupsi. Terdakwa terbukti dengan sengaja menyalahgunakan kewenangan untuk menguntungkan diri sendiri, orang lain atau korporasi yang merugikan keuangan negara.
Terdakwa bersekongkol dengan Kepala Dinas Lingkungan Hidup Kabupaten Sidoarjo Hasan Basri yang telah lebih dahulu divonis empat tahun penjara, sehingga merugikan keuangan negara Rp 193 juta lebih.
Leksono yang juga pemilik dan pendiri CV Budi Luhur berhasil melaksanakan proyek reboisasi hutan mangrove di Sidoarjo. Bahkan Leksono bisa mempengaruhi keputusan Hasan Basri sebagai kepala Badan Lingkungan Hidup Sidoarjo untuk memindahkan lokasi penanaman bibit mangrove di luar ketentuan.
Dari proyek tersebut, Leksono mendapatkan keuntungan Rp 85 juta lebih. Sedangkan Hasan Basri Rp 96 juta. Persekongkolan antara keduanya, menurut jaksa, dilakukan secara sadar untuk memperkaya diri sendiri atau orang lain.
Penasihat Hukum terdakwa, Agung Ahmad Wijaya, menyesalkan penahanan terhadap kliennya. Dia mengatakan terdakwa selalu kooperatif selama penyidikan hingga persidangan. "Tak ada alasan hakim menahan terdakwa," ucapya. EKO WIDIANTO.

description.hltext_display: Growth to halve in '11/12, CPI at zero: Japan
Japan's export growth sees boost in November
description.content:
Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading came in short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
Exports in November rose 9.1 percent to 5.44 trillion yen on year, the 12th straight monthly increase, with strong overseas demand, particularly for Japanese steel and metal working machinery, the ministry said.
The growth rate rose for the first time since February, when exports grew 45.3 percent. The rate had dropped to 7.8 percent in October.
However, the November figure missed expectations for a 10.8 percent rise in a poll of economists by Dow Jones Newswires.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken.
"Japan's exports are slowing, a trend that remains the same," said Taro Saito, senior economist at NLI Research Institute.
"The economy continues to be pressured by the higher yen, although the strength of the currency is becoming moderate," he said.
The unit has been relatively stable in recent weeks after hitting a 15-year high of 80.21 against the dollar in November, giving some respite to the export sector and easing pressure on the economy.
But it has stayed at a relatively high level, at 83.82 to the dollar in Wednesday trade.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing".
Economic growth in the July-September quarter was earlier this month revised up to an annualised 4.5 percent thanks to a rush to beat expiring government incentives, but expectations are for a contraction in the fourth quarter.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion US dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession.
Prime Minister Naoto Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, accounting for nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions.
In November, Japan's exports to China jumped 18.3 percent while those to the United States rose 1.2 percent.
Exports to Europe expanded 10.1 percent, the first rise in two months, data showed.
Japan's imports in November also jumped 14.2 percent to 5.28 trillion yen, the 11th consecutive rise, driven higher by demand for iron ore as well as audio and visual devices.
The larger imports almost halved the country's trade surplus in the month from a year earlier, marking the first decline in three months, the finance ministry said.
The overall surplus stood at 162.8 billion yen (1.94 billion US dollars), 55.4 percent smaller than a year earlier, the ministry said, much lower than the market forecast of 446 billion yen.

event_or_fact.property: The economy continues to be pressured by the higher yen, although the strength of the currency is becoming moderate
Japan's exports are slowing, a trend that remains the same

description.hltext_display: 争“轻娱乐”开发者资源游戏业抢平台布局
description.content:
针对社交游戏、小游戏等“轻娱乐”产品的开发平台正成为网游业勤于耕作的新耕地，而开发者也成为了行业巨头争夺的新资源。
昨天，九城在北京宣布，已透过旗下全资子公司与美国OpenFeintInc.达成协议，获得全球领先的移动互联网游戏社交平台OpenFeint的软件代理权，在中国进行本地化运营。软件授权期为5年，目前他们已选定10款游戏产品，在给予保底分成的同时代为发行推广。
算上此前已加入战团的盛大、网龙、网易等，这场布局战越发火热。
开发平台布局
今年7月，九城投资AuroraFeint公司并获得其少数股权，随后拿到了OpenFeint在中国的运营权。目前该平台的中文测试版本已推出，计划在明年3月推出正式版。
OpenFeint是美国公司AuroraFeint所开发的手机游戏社交平台，开发者只需将OpenFeint提供的一些代码加入游戏，就可以在游戏中获得排行榜、好友导入、论坛等功能，把一款单机游戏变为轻度的联网游戏。
截至目前，OpenFeint在全球的注册开发者超过13000个，游戏超过3800款，用户超过5000万。
九城无线事业部高级技术总监黄雪斌介绍称，在本地化运营中，将会根据中国开发者的需求对平台进行修改，着重加强游戏中的交互功能，接下来平台将和国内的SNS网站合作进行好友导入。
在为Openfeint项目招募开发者的同时，九城还宣布与华岩资本、成为基金和险峰华兴创业投资共同组建一只“成就基金”，规模1亿美元，用于投资国内外移动互联网领域。
“成就基金投资的项目成果我们将会有多种渠道进行运营。”九城副总裁、无线事业部总经理沈国定表示，其中的手机游戏应用也可导入Openfeint平台。

description.hltext_display: Foodies fight with film school for space in LA
description.content:
LOS ANGELES Fans of the Hollywood Farmers Market are hoping for a permanent resolution to the permitting dispute that's been threatening the weekly produce bazaar.
Organizers have until mid-April to reach an accommodation with the adjacent film school that has been refusing to sign off on the market's permit.
Los Angeles Film School officials say the market blocks an entryway into one of the school's parking lots for several hours each Sunday.
Organizers say shifting the stalls that block the lot to another part of the market would result in the loss of many vendors. They say that could cut back on revenue they use to support smaller markets in the city's poor neighborhoods.

description.hltext_display: CIA launches 'task force' to assess impact of U.S. diplomatic cables' leak by WikiLeaks
description.content:
CIA launches 'task force' to assess impact of U.S. diplomatic cables' leak by WikiLeaks
Britain News.Net
The Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) has reportedly launched a task force to assess the impact of thousands of secret U.S. diplomatic cables and military files exposed by the whistleblower website 'Wikileaks'.
According to the Washington Post, the panel is officially called the WikiLeaks Task Force, and is focusing on the immediate impact of the most recently released files.
"The director asked the task force to examine whether the latest release of WikiLeaks documents might affect the agency's foreign relationships or operations," the paper quoted CIA spokesman George Little, as saying.
The panel is being reportedly led by CIA's Counterintelligence Center and has over a dozen members from departments across the agency.
According to some veterans, WikiLeaks has breached the CIA's long-standing dislike to sharing secrets with other government agencies.
A former high-ranking CIA official who recently retired, said that even while moving to share more information over the past decade, the agency "has not capitulated to this business of making everything available to outsiders. They don't even make everything available to insiders. And by and large the system has worked"
CIA employs software measures to minimize the chance of a WikiLeaks-like leak, and has been avoiding moving secret information from pieces of paper to digital files that can be distributed online, the paper said. (ANI)
Have your say on this story

event_or_fact.property: The director asked the task force to examine whether the latest release of WikiLeaks documents might affect the agency's foreign relationships or operations

description.hltext_display: US suits against Pakistani spy chief face hurdles
description.content:
NEW YORK The plaintiffs in two U.S. lawsuits accusing Pakistan's spy chief of nurturing terrorists involved in the 2008 Mumbai attacks are hoping for a historic outcome recalling the Lockerbie settlement, but they would have to overcome serious legal obstacles first, lawyers and experts say.
The civil complaints naming Gen. Ahmed Shuja Pasha and his Inter-Services Intelligence agency as defendants are like past lawsuits filed in federal courts against overseas figures with alleged links to terrorist attacks and other atrocities.
A lawyer for the U.S. plaintiffs, John Kreindler, said Tuesday that they hope to win a deal like the one struck with Libya over the 1988 bombing of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie, Scotland. The $1.5 billion settlement announced in 2008 was seen both as a victory for the families of 180 Americans killed in the terrorist attack and as a diplomatic breakthrough with the North African nation, once a pariah.
"The hope is to obtain appropriate compensation, but we also see it as a chance for the United States and Pakistan to join together and condemn terrorism," he said.
"I think our chances are very good," he added. "We wouldn't be doing it if it was simply for show."
But experts say a U.S. court could find that Pasha, as a high-ranking foreign official, is protected by sovereign immunity. Even when not protected, many international defendants don't bother to respond to summonses and, as a result, never see the inside of an American courthouse or engage in settlement negotiations.
Judges can hear testimony from the plaintiffs and order damages, but the chances of collecting are a long shot. In some cases, judges have tossed out cases after the U.S. government opposed them on diplomatic grounds.
"Lawsuits like this aren't highly successful," said John F. Murphy, a professor at Villanova University School of Law in suburban Philadelphia. "Decisions that have been favorable to the plaintiffs have been largely symbolic."
In Pakistan, prominent lawyer Athar Minallah said Tuesday that with the U.S. court's jurisdiction in question, he couldn't see the litigation getting very far.
"Why should they even bother to respond?" Minallah said of Pasha and the ISI.
An ISI representative said Tuesday that Pasha had received a summons but declined to discuss the case further.
The wrongful death lawsuits were filed last month in federal court in Brooklyn by relatives of victims in the Mumbai attacks, which left 166 people and nine attackers dead. The assault has been blamed on the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba, which is also named as a defendant.
The lawsuits repeat long-standing allegations that the ISI "has long nurtured and used international terrorist groups," including Lashkar.
"Defendant ISI provided critical planning, material support, control and coordination of the attacks" by a roving band of gunmen who attacked a Jewish community center, a popular restaurant and tourist hotels, the lawsuits allege.
The plaintiffs' lawyer has said they would not publicly discuss the case. They include the Brooklyn father of Gavriel Holtzberg, a rabbi who was killed along with his pregnant wife at the Jewish center, and the wife of Sandeep Jeswani, a Chicago man who was traveling on business when he was killed at a hotel.
The lawsuits, which seek unspecified damages, were filed under the Alien Tort Statute, an 18th century law that allows U.S. citizens to sue in U.S. courts for acts that violate international law. The law originally was enacted to prosecute pirates but has been used more recently by Holocaust survivors and relatives of people killed or tortured under despotic regimes.
In New York, lawsuits seeking billions of dollars in damages were filed by representatives, survivors and relatives of Sept. 11 victims against foreign governments, charities, financial institutions and individuals believed to have provided support to al-Qaida. The plaintiffs claim the defendants gave money to charities in order to funnel it to al-Qaida.
The cases are still pending but suffered a setback last year when the Supreme Court refused to allow claims against Saudi Arabia and four of its princes. The court left in place the ruling of a federal appeals court that the defendants are protected by sovereign immunity.
Other high-profile cases that were allowed to go forward have resulted in massive awards that remain unpaid.
In 2000, a federal judge in Manhattan ordered former Bosnian Serb leader Radovan Karadzic to pay $4.5 billion in damages for Serb atrocities in the 1992-1995 Bosnian war. The award came only weeks after another jury returned a $745 million verdict against Karadzic in another civil case in the same courthouse.
The plaintiffs had alleged gross human rights abuses, including genocide, torture, rape and execution in an ethnic cleansing campaign to drive non-Serbians from their homes in Bosnia-Herzegovina.
Karadzic fought the claims through New York lawyers for four years before telling the judge he would not defend himself. He never paid any damages and is currently fighting genocide charges at the U.N. war crimes tribunal in The Hague, Netherlands.
Karadzic had mocked the civil litigation, writing, "Do you really believe that attaching a U.S. dollar sign to human tragedy around the world by empty judgments in uncontested lawsuits is a step toward peace or justice?"
There was a similar outcome for a lawsuit against former Haitian paramilitary leader Emmanuel "Toto" Constant, who human rights groups say ordered the slaughter in the early 1990s of slum dwellers loyal to exiled President Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
In 2006, another Manhattan judge awarded $19 million to three Haitian women who claimed they were gang-raped by paramilitary soldiers under Constant's command. But Constant, who is now serving time in a New York state prison for mortgage fraud, never responded to the complaint, nor has he paid a dime in damages.
Still, the Center for Constitutional Rights, which sued on behalf of the women, considers the outcome a success, said Maria LaHood, a senior attorney for the human rights group.
LaHood said a main goal of such lawsuits is to hold the accused accountable by drawing attention to their crimes.
"It's primarily about justice for the victims, even if they're not going to be compensated in the end," she said.

description.hltext_display: BP ist wohl aus dem Gröbsten heraus
description.content:
Kulmbach (aktiencheck.de AG) - Den Experten vom Anlegermagazin "Der Aktionär" zufolge können mutige Anleger bei der BP-Aktie (ISIN GB0007980591 / WKN 850517) einsteigen.
Knapp acht Monate nach der Explosion der Ölförderplattform Deepwater Horizon habe die US-Regierung den britischen Ölmulti BP sowie acht weitere an der Katastrophe beteiligte Unternehmen wegen des Verstoßes gegen Umweltgesetze auf Schadensersatz verklagt. Allerdings gebe es bislang nach keine genauen Angaben über die Höhe der Schadensersatzforderungen.
Nach Einschätzung der Experten dürfte der Konzern trotz der Klage wohl aus dem Gröbsten heraus sein. Es seien bereits Milliarden abgeschrieben oder in Entschädigungsfonds eingezahlt worden.
Mutige Anleger können bei der mit einem 2011er KGV von 7 günstig bewerteten BP-Aktie einsteigen, so die Experten von "Der Aktionär". (Ausgabe 52/10 - 01/11) (22.12.2010/ac/a/a)
Offenlegung von möglichen Interessenskonflikten:
Mögliche Interessenskonflikte können Sie auf der Site des Erstellers/ der Quelle der Analyse einsehen.

description.hltext_display: “김성민, 속옷에 마약 넣어 국내 밀반입”
description.content: 김성민이 필리핀에서 구입한 필로폰을 속옷 또는 여행가방에 넣어 국내에 반입한 것으로 밝혀졌다.22일 서울중앙지검 강� �부(김희준 부장검사)에 따르면 김성민은 2008년 4월 필리핀 세부의 한 호텔에서 약 30만원을 주� 필로폰을 산 뒤 막탄공항에서 비행기를 타� 인천공항을 통해 귀국했다. 이 과� �에서 마약류를 속옷과 여행가방에 숨겨 출입국심사대를 통과한 것으로 알� �졌다.지난 8월까지 총 3차례에 걸쳐 상당량의 필로폰을 국내 반입한 혐의를 받� 있다. 또한, 5월과 9월 수차례에 걸쳐 주거지인 서울 역삼동의 한 오피스텔에서 필로폰을 주입하� 대마초를 흡연한 혐의도 받았다.한편, 검찰은 22일 김성민을 구속기소하면서 "마약사건과 관� �된 연예인이 3명 � �도 더 있다"며 수사확대 방침을 밝혔다.� �지원 기자 [cinezzang@joongang.co.kr]

description.hltext_display: | IGEL Technology: Thin Clients im Kommen
description.content:
] Das Unternehmen IGEL Technology profitiert nach eigenen Angaben vom wachsenden Thin-Client-Markt und der Zusammenarbeit mit Acer Deutschland.
Der Markt für Thin Clients zieht nach einem schwächeren Jahr 2009 wieder kräftig an. Für 2010 rechnet das Marktforschungsunternehmen Gartner weltweit mit 20 Prozent Wachstum, bis 2014 mit jährlich 41 Prozent. Auch der deutsche Thin-Client-Marktführer IGEL Technology liegt mit seinem Lösungsportfolio weiter auf Wachstumskurs. Das Unternehmen geht von einem Absatzplus von annähernd 30 Prozent gegenüber dem Vorjahr aus. Dank der Vermarktung des führenden IGEL-Linux-Betriebssystems profitiert der Hersteller nach eigenen Angaben indirekt vom Aufschwung am Nettop-Markt. Denn zusammen mit dem Unternehmen Acer Deutschland biete IGEL Technology eine zuverlässige und energieeffiziente Lösung, die leistungsfähige Hardware mit der umfangreichen IGEL-Software kombiniere. (cs)
Weitere Informationen:
| Siemens: IT-Sparte an Atos verkauft [15.12.2010] Atos Origin übernimmt Siemens IT Solutions and Services. Im Gegenzug wird der Siemens-Konzern Aktionär und strategischer Partner des französischen IT-Unternehmens.
| Studie: IKT-Standort Deutschland im Vergleich [8.12.2010] Im Vergleich der 15 führenden IKT-Nationen liegt der Standort Deutschland im Mittelfeld. Dies zeigt die Studie Monitoring-Report Deutschland Digital 2010 des Marktforschungsunternehmens TNS Infratest.
| Brandenburg: PPP für Geodaten [29.9.2010] Öffentliche Hand und Wirtschaft in Brandenburg sollen von einer jetzt geschlossenen Public Private Partnership (PPP) zu Luftbildaufnahmen und Digitalen Orthophotos profitieren.
| Gesundheitswesen: Mehr Investitionen in IT [15.9.2010] Das Marktforschungsinstitut Pierre Audoin Consultants erwartet, dass das deutsche Gesundheitswesen in den kommenden Jahren mehr Geld für Informationstechnologien ausgeben wird.
| Fraunhofer FOKUS / Accelsis: Kooperation vereinbart [31.8.2010] Eine Zusammenarbeit im Bereich E-Government, Business Process Management und Service-orientierte Architekturen (SOA) haben das Fraunhofer-Institut FOKUS und die Firma Accelsis Technologies vereinbart.
| Intergraph: Übernahme durch Hexagon [8.7.2010] Für mehr als zwei Milliarden US-Dollar wird die schwedische Firma Hexagon das Unternehmen Intergraph übernehmen. Der GIS-Anbieter wird künftig als separater Geschäftsbereich von Hexagon unter Namen und Branding Intergraph auftreten.
| bremen online services: Partner von Red Hat [16.6.2010] Die Unternehmen bremen online services und Red Hat bauen ihre Zusammenarbeit weiter aus. Die Bremer Firma ist jetzt zum ISV Advanced Partner ernannt worden.
| ITDZ Berlin: Sammelvertrag für Software [14.5.2010] Mit einem Sammelvertrag für Software-Lizenzen will das ITDZ Berlin die Kosten der Berliner Verwaltung senken. Eine entsprechende Vereinbarung haben der IT-Dienstleister und die Firma Oracle jetzt unterzeichnet.
| VISkompakt: Integrierte Suche [4.3.2010] Nutzer von VISkompakt sollen künftig alle gespeicherten Informationen leichter in Dokumenten, Vorgängen und Akten finden. Möglich macht dies die Integration der Suchmaschine der Firma ScanJour in die Anwendung von PDV-Systeme.
| Public Private Partnership: Markterkundung gestartet [24.2.2010] Eine Markterkundung zu Public Private Partnerships in den Bereichen IT und Dienstleistungen hat das Beratungsunternehmen ÖPP Deutschland gestartet.

description.hltext_display: Eugene Goldwasser, biochemist behind lifesaving drug, dies
description.content:
CHICAGO Dr. Eugene Goldwasser, 88, a University of Chicago biochemist who identified one of the body's key hormones and helped launch a new drug that revolutionized dialysis treatment, died Dec. 17 in his Hyde Park home of prostate cancer complications, said his family.
In 1977, after nearly 25 years of research, Goldwasser discovered the hormone secreted by the kidneys known as erythropoietin, or EPO, which controls production of oxygen-carrying red blood cells.
He shared his discovery with a California-based biotechnology firm, Amgen Corp., which developed an artificial version of the hormone. In 1989, Amgen won federal approval for the first EPO drug to treat anemia in dialysis and cancer patients. In later years, other drug companies manufactured their own brands of EPO, spawning a billion-dollar industry.
EPO became the third major human hormone to be produced by genetic engineering techniques, after insulin and human growth hormone. Dr. Goldwasser was dubbed "the father of EPO."
"It is one of the great contributions to science or medicine of the 20th century, comparable to the discovery of insulin," said Dr. Donald Steiner, professor of biochemistry and molecular biology at the University of Chicago.
In recent years, the emergence of recombinant EPO has sparked controversy over how much is charged for it and its use by athletes as a performance-enhancing drug.
Goldwasser never profited from the research that led to the lifesaving drug as the university did not file for a patent.
But, his son said, making money meant little to him.
"He was first and foremost a scientist and he was gratified that he was able to make such a great contribution," said James Goldwasser. "He took deep satisfaction in his work and remained excited about the possibilities in the future."
Eugene Goldwasser was born on Oct. 14, 1922, in Brooklyn, N.Y. He spent his first decade there before the Depression forced his father to close a small clothing manufacturing business and move to Kansas City, where his brother ran a similar business.
In high school, Goldwasser developed an interest in science. He won a scholarship to the University of Chicago, where he majored in biological sciences. After the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, he worked as a research assistant in the university's Toxicity Laboratory, a federally funded program to assess chemical and biological risks. He completed his bachelor's degree in biochemistry in March 1943.
In 1944, he was drafted into the Army and served for two years as a biochemist at Fort Detrick, Md., where he worked on anthrax. In 1946, he returned to Chicago to get his doctorate in biochemistry and started working at the University's Argonne Cancer Research Hospital.
Back in Chicago, he met Florence Cohen, whom he married in 1949. They remained together until her death in 1981. He married Deone Jackman in 1986, and she survives him.
Working under Dr. Leon Jacobson at Argonne, Goldwasser became interested in how the blood-forming process recovered after radiation exposure. In 1955, he began research to find the signal that regulates new red blood cells.
The quest became his life's work.
"The problem was that erythropoietin is present in plasma in very small amounts," Goldwasser said in a 1998 Chicago Tribune interview. "It took us about 15 years just to purify it."
A large amount of serum from anemic sheep enabled him to amass trace amounts of the elusive hormone.
In 1977, Goldwasser published details of his discovery in the Journal of Biological Chemistry. He also filled out the patent disclosure form and submitted it to the university. But school officials did not follow through on the patent process.
"After submitting the form, I promptly forgot about it," Goldwasser wrote years later, "since nothing was ever done about filing for a patent. I believe the rules at the time would have allowed me to file a patent for myself if the agency or the University decided not to - another point to perhaps be rueful about."
When Chicago medical labs took no interest in his finding, Goldwasser shared his results with a fledgling new firm in California, Applied Molecular Genetics, which would become Amgen. In 1986 and 1987, the first reports from clinical studies confirmed that the drug could correct anemia in patients with kidney failure. By 1996, annual sales of the new drug in the United States exceeded $1 billion.
Patients who started treatment with the EPO drug were spared blood transfusions and able to lead longer, more productive lives.
When Goldwasser saw what EPO did for dialysis patients, he was overjoyed.
"It was sheer elation," he said in a 1998 Tribune interview. "All those years. But it helped people."
However, when a scandal involving EPO erupted at the Tour de France in 1998, Goldwasser was crushed. Bicyclists were injecting the drug to boost their red blood cell counts.
"I feel utter dismay," he told the Tribune. "Not only is it being misused, it is being misused in a way that's dangerous to people. Did I ever imagine that could happen? No. No, I didn't."
By the time of his retirement in 2002, Goldwasser had published more than 150 research studies and 60 book chapters - almost all of them about some aspect of erythropoietin. He authored two short books: a biography of Dr. Leon Jacobson and a recently completed history of the quest for erythropoietin, scheduled for release next year.
His family said he was an avid and gifted photographer, sailor and traveler.
He is also survived by two other sons, Thomas and Matthew; two stepchildren, Tom and Tara Jackman; and seven grandchildren.
A memorial service at the University of Chicago is being planned for January.

description.hltext_display: Rencana Parkir Berlangganan Ditolak
description.content:
TEMPO Interaktif, Jakarta - Koordinator bidang Pengaduan dan Hukum Yayasan Lembaga Konsumen Indonesia (YLKI), Karunia Asih Rahayu mengatakan, tarif berlangganan yang relatif murah justru membuat masyarakat beralih pada kendaraan pribadi. "Tarif ini relatif murah, untuk motor Rp 35.000 dan Rp 75.000 pertahun. Masyarakat akan berbondong-bondong menggunakan kendaraan pribadi, sudah pasti Jakarta akan tambah macet," ujarnya dalam diskusi Perlindungan Konsumen atas Jasa Perparkiran, di Hotel Ambahara, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (22/12).
Ketua Institut Studi Transportasi, Darmaningtyas menambahkan rencana tersebut juga dapat memicu konfllik horizontal di msayarakat dari juru parkir dengan pemilik parkir. Dengan berlangganan, masyarakat tidak perlu lagi membayar tarif, padahal hal tersebut merupakan sumber pendapatan untuk juru parkir. "Parkir mungkin dilihat sebagai fasilitas, tapi juga instrumen mendapatkan uang," jelasnya.
Penolakan juga dilontarkan Kepala Sub Direktorat Penegakan Hukum Direktorat Lalu Lintas Polda Metro Jaya, Ajun Komisaris Besar Yakub Dedy Karyawan. Menurutnya wacana pembayaran parkir berlangganan yang sedianya dibayarkan pertahun saat mengurus perpanjangan Surat Tanda Nomor Kendaraan (STNK), PKB dan BBNKB tidak bisa dilakukan. "Antara retribusi dan pajak itu berbeda, tidak bisa dipaksakan untuk dibayar bersama. Samsat tidak bisa mengurus parkir berlangganan," tambahnya.
Sementara itu Manager Perencanaan Unit Pelaksana Tugas (UPT) Parkir DKI, Syaefudin Zuhri menilai wacana parkir berlangganan dibutuhkan untuk mengurangi kebocoran retribusi parkir yang selama ini terjadi. Pemasukan tersebut nantinya akan digunakan untuk membangun gedung parkir yang dibutuhkan di Jakarta.
Dengan konsep baru ini diperkirakan pendapatan parkir bisa meningkat hingga Rp 224 miliar. Padahal saat ini pendapatan retribusi parkir untuk DKI Jakarta ditargetkan hanya mencapai Rp 19 miliar.

description.hltext_display: 工信部：中欧将推进未来互联网和IPv6合作
description.content:
【字体：大 中 小】
工业和信息化部副部长杨学山21日表示，中欧将积极推进在未来互联网和下一代互联网协议IPv6方面的合作，并将联合发布宣言落实IPv6合作。
杨学山是在北京举行的第三次中欧经贸高层对话上作出上述表示的。
IP地址即互联网地址，是用来唯一标识互联网中计算机的逻辑地址，具有唯一性，相当于生活中家庭地址的门牌号码。IPv4地址是目前正在广泛使用的IP协议，它采用32位地址长度，全球可用的IPv4地址只有大约43亿个，因此全球互联网必须过渡到下一代版本的IP地址协议即IPv6地址。
杨学山说，工业和信息化部和欧盟方面有多个合作机制和渠道，在中小企业、材料、汽车、电信、信息技术、信息化等领域进行不同层次交流。
杨学山介绍，在日前举行的第二次中欧信息技术、电信和信息化对话上，工信部和欧盟信息社会与媒体总司同意进一步拓宽和深化信息技术、电信和信息领域合作。双方将推荐中欧双方专家积极推进未来互联网和下一代互联网协议IPV6等方面合作，推动双方有关企业的首席信息官进行互访和交流，并共同探讨有关云计算的研究。
“在全球化深入发展大背景下，双方要进一步发挥中欧信息技术、电信和信息化对话机制的作用，在信息通讯技术创新、信息通讯基础设施构建、信息通讯技术应用、信息产业发展和网络信息安全保障方面进一步开展合作与交流。”杨学山说。（来源：新华社）

description.hltext_display: A small handbag clutch
description.content:
Today, small handbags clutch is not just an accessory to evening attire. This is a full pouch. It can be seen in the hands not only well-dressed FLANMARK.com ladies at social events and evening party. Even on a weekday, the street or in the office of flash, these elegant little girl. And what is the story of this lady's accessories?Like all bags clutch came from a purse. At the beginning of the purse, made of leather or cloth, worn hands. But over time the size of the purse has grown. People were taking with them more and more things. Then, with an increase in crime purse began to wear on your belt, and the woman hid him under the skirts. But these measures did not save the purse from the dexterous hands of thieves. At the end of the XVI century skills of European craftsmen has increased significantly. Began to make a purse out of quality leather or durable beautiful fabrics. These purse are decorated with precious stones, beautiful embroidery and pearls. Well, how to hide such beauty under the skirts. Now, these purse-handbags were to flaunt. Began experimenting with shapes, colors, materials and decorations.As a result of these experiments are two bright favorite - a pouch and handbag. Pouch - a bag in a bag, which the lace is tightened. Handbag - handbag oblong shape with a small strap that fits over the hand. It's practically a modern clutch. These bags are simply indispensable for special outputs. Such a handbag and clutch in the twentieth century. His took with them exclusively at the gala dinner and cocktail outlets.In the mid-twentieth century, a small clutch handbag has become popular. description.hltext_display: Sandoval stalks city, county coffers (35 comments)
description.content:
It has been apparent for some time that the state would look to cities and counties to help bridge its multibillion-dollar budget gap.
Even before Gov.-elect Brian Sandoval won the election, budget staff had begun gathering data on cities and counties’ tax revenue. And Sandoval, who won promising to balance the budget without raising taxes, has since said he will look to local government for tax revenue.
The administration has not publicly detailed how it will go about taking the money, but sources have told the Sun the outlines are taking shape.
Specifically, sources say:
• Sandoval is considering taking a chunk — 5 cents per $100 of assessed value — of county property tax revenue. That would translate into about $70 million-$80 million less for Clark County and that much more for the state and come on top of the 4 cents the state took two years ago, costing the county $60 million.
• The governor-elect’s staff has informed county staff that it wants district courts in Washoe and Clark counties to assume most of the $11 million cost of pre-sentence investigations now done by the state Division of Parole and Probation. Clark County already handles all juvenile probation cases.
• Sandoval wants to give Clark County responsibility for “back-end” support of child welfare — foster care, counseling and institutions to house children — which the state would hand off with some funding to pay for it. The state spends
$91.5 million on back-end child welfare services. The county, at its expense, handles case investigations by Family Services and Metro Police intervention.
• The governor-elect might also take a bigger share of federal funding that pays medical expenses for the poor. Clark County contributes millions of dollars — $65 million in 2009 to the state’s Disproportionate Share Hospital fund — which the state uses to attract increased federal funding in the form of matching dollars. In return, University Medical Center two years ago got about $80 million. But the state also keeps millions for itself. In 2008, the state kept $19 million of about $107 million, or about 18 percent. Sources say the state wants to increase that share.
Sandoval’s senior adviser, Dale Erquiaga, acknowledged that Sandoval is carefully considering “all of the data,” while building a budget that does not include a tax increase. Erquiaga, however, said the Sandoval administration’s strategy likely won’t mimic the tactics of past administrations and legislatures, which looked simply to standing pots of money for a short-term fix for the state’s lack of revenue.
“We’re trying to end the process of ‘here’s a bunch of money and we’ll just take it,’” Erquiaga said. “We’re trying to look at the system as a whole, where
$20 billion in revenue is spent. We have a tendency to look only at the state general fund and see a shortfall. The governor-elect is looking at really the whole picture (of state and local governments). We have that much money to spend and, as a people, where should we spend it?”
Sandoval must prepare a budget by Jan. 24, when he will deliver his State of the State address and unveil his spending plan. The Legislature will spend the next four months debating, amending and voting on the budget.
John Oceguera, D-Las Vegas and the incoming Assembly speaker, said he had not seen or heard the governor’s budget proposals. But, he added, the upcoming legislative session will involve considering budget cuts and moving services between local and state governments.
At least in Northern Nevada, some governments are trying to obligate any money they had been saving for capital projects out of fear that the state may empty their accounts.
Reno Mayor Bob Cashell said last month that the Reno City Council has ordered the city’s road funds to be obligated quickly and he has advised the Truckee River Flood Project managers to do the same. Cashell is assuming the state will go after city dollars, as well as county dollars.
During the previous legislative session, only counties were targeted, a strategic move by lawmakers to limit opposition to their targeting of local dollars. By Clark County’s estimate, state lawmakers in 2009 cost it about $180 million over the next two budget years.
There appears to be no moves to tie up Clark County dollars before the state swoops in to take a cut.
Clark County Commissioner Steve Sisolak said it is assumed the state will try to take some money. Unlike two years ago, however, he wants it to be fair — all Nevada governments, not just Washoe and Clark counties, should shoulder some of the burden.
“Henderson just opened a new aquatic center (this year) and we can’t even fix the pool at Sunset Park,” he said. The state “seems to ignore some of these cities have more money than the counties do. I understand we have to take a hit, but it can’t just be the two counties.”
At the same time, Sisolak said Clark County isn’t doing itself any favors by approving contracts with employees that include salary increases amid the state’s worst recession. He and his fellow commissioners are set to vote today on contracts with the public employee unions of the Las Vegas Valley Water District that would tie future raises to increases in the consumer price index. “I think it makes (legislators) think we have more money than we do,” he said.
Outgoing Commission Chairman Rory Reid, who ran unsuccessfully against Sandoval, said that “if the state is looking at the counties as if they are flush and can solve every problem, that perception is simply inaccurate.”
Reid said he tried to collaborate with the state, “but if the state continues to look at local government as nothing more than an account to access when they have problems, that’s going to make collaboration even less likely.”
Commissioner Chris Giunchigliani, who served 16 years in the Legislature before being elected to the commission, said Carson City is so far from Las Vegas that representatives forget where they came from and who got them there. It’s up to voters to remind them, she said, “to get into it. If you have a relationship with your legislator, you can tell them what their cuts will do. That’s part of a constituent’s responsibility.”
She was more circumspect on the governor’s budget. The budget is a starting point and it rarely looks the same at the finish, she said.
Sandoval “has got to do what he has to get the ball rolling, it’s a place to start,” she said. “But this isn’t the time to rob Peter to pay Paul. This is a time to collaborate and look at efficiencies, redundancies, shared staffing and consolidations where appropriate.”

description.hltext_display: ارتفاع سعر البنزين والمازوت وانخفاض سعر الغاز
description.content:
ارتفع سعر صفيحة البنزين 300 ليرة، والكاز 400 ليرة، والمازوت 400 ليرة، وانخفض سعر قارورة الغاز وزن 10 كلغ 200 ليرة و12.5 كلغ 300 ليرة لبنانية.
فقد صدر عن وزير الطاقة والمياه جبران باسيل قرارات، حدد بموجبها الحد الأعلى لسعر مبيع المحروقات في الأراضي اللبنانية كافة، إعتبارا من اليوم الاربعاء كالاتي:
ـ صفيحة بنزين 98 أوكتان: 35.300 ل.ل.
ـ صفيحة بنزين 95 أوكتان: 34.600 ل.ل.
ـ صفيحة الكاز: 23.300 ل.ل.
ـ صفيحة المازوت: 23.500 ل.ل.
ـ صفيحة الديزل أويل: 24.000 ل.ل.
ـ قارورة الغاز 10 كلغ: 20.000 ل.ل.
ـ قارورة الغاز 12.5 كلغ: 24.400 ل.ل.

description.hltext_display: Foodies fight with film school for space in LA
description.content:
LOS ANGELES For a few weeks this month, Los Angeles' arugula-munching set confronted a threat that seemed as potent as any malicious insect, pathogen or pesticide-tainted produce.
Where would they get their lovingly grown, locally sourced fruits, vegetables and artisanal edibles if a parking dispute with an adjacent film school forced the Hollywood Farmers Market to move or close?
The Los Angeles Film School, which has held classes in its nine-story Sunset Boulevard building since 1999, had refused to sign off on a permit for the Sunday farmers market because it blocks an entryway into a lot where the school's growing number of students park. At the root of the conflict were some of the city's sacred mainstays: deep agricultural ties, the entertainment business and a lack of parking in a town dominated by cars.
Even as a temporary accord last week put the threat on hold, the foodie furor offered a peek at how dependent some have become on the Hollywood market, among the largest in the region, and the smaller markets it supports in low-income communities.
While consumer demand has encouraged farmers markets to sprout like Portobello mushrooms across the U.S., the attachment to just-picked produce and those who grow it appears particularly intense in Los Angeles, seated in a county that less than a century ago was the nation's leading agricultural producer.
"When you're talking about growers and shoppers being able to complete the exchange directly, it has a lot of resonance," cookbook author and food writer Amelia Saltsman said.
The Los Angeles Film School recently added computer animation and video game production to its curricula of film and recording arts, more than doubling the size of its student body from 750 to 1,700, spokesman Antoine Ibrahim said.
The growing population has increased demand for parking spots on Sundays, when throngs of students flood the school's labs and studios, Ibrahim said. The school also plans to begin holding classes on Sundays to relieve increasing weekday class sizes, he said.
Ibrahim insisted that the school never meant for the market to be shut down. It just wanted the vendors blocking the lot to be shifted to another part of the market.
"We've always worked with them to compromise and coexist," Ibrahim said. "We don't want them to move."
But the nonprofit Sustainable Economic Enterprises of Los Angeles, which organizes the market, said the configuration being pushed by the school meant it would lose half of its 100 farmers because there wouldn't be enough space for their stalls.
Shoppers say that would diminish their experience and make them less likely to schlep from far-flung neighborhoods to the produce bazaar that draws some 10,000 customers each weekend.
"It's really sad if they were to have to close or reduce the size," said Vanessa Lee, 27, who journeys from her east Los Angeles home at least once a month to buy apples, peaches or persimmons - depending on the season - from the market. "I couldn't imagine losing any of the vendors. They're all great."
Shrinking the market would also hurt SEE-LA's ability to subsidize markets that provide fruits and vegetables to as many 2,200 people each week in poor areas such as Watts and south Los Angeles, manager Alexandra Agajanian said.
"The success of the Hollywood Farmers Market has made it possible for us to do that," SEE-LA chief executive Pompea Smith said. "It really is a well-loved institution."
SEE-LA learned in early November that it was losing its permit because it lacked the school's endorsement, although extensions have kept the market open since then.
As word spread that the market's days were numbered, the dispute drew concern even among those who couldn't see the Hollywood sign.
TV and radio news outlets aired stories. The Los Angeles Times editorialized that "the market must be saved." City Councilman Eric Garcetti, whose district includes the market, received e-mails, calls and office visits from concerned shoppers and constituents.
Word came Thursday evening that a meeting between the market, the school and Garcetti's office had yielded an agreement that would keep the market open until April 12 while its organizers and the film school seek a permanent solution to the parking problem.
The school will look at building another way into the lot. SEE-LA, meanwhile, will hire a planner to see if there's a way to move the stalls to create access into the lot and still fit in all the farmers.
"I think this is a fair approach," Smith said. "As long as it doesn't decrease the connectivity among the blocks of the market and doesn't decrease the number of farmers and doesn't decrease the safety of the market customers, I think it will be fine."

It's really sad if they were to have to close or reduce the size; I couldn't imagine losing any of the vendors. They're all great.

I think this is a fair approach; As long as it doesn't decrease the connectivity among the blocks of the market and doesn't decrease the number of farmers and doesn't decrease the safety of the market customers, I think it will be fine.

description.hltext_display: Golden Star Resources "outperform"
description.content:
St. Petersburg (aktiencheck.de AG) - Brad Humphrey, Analyst von Raymond James, stuft die Aktie von Golden Star Resources (ISIN CA38119T1049 / WKN 888002) von "market perform" auf "outperform" hoch. Das Kursziel werde von 5,30 auf 6,20 USD angehoben. (Analyse vom 21.12.10) (22.12.2010/ac/a/u)
Offenlegung von möglichen Interessenskonflikten:
Mögliche Interessenskonflikte können Sie auf der Site des Erstellers/ der Quelle der Analyse einsehen.

description.hltext_display: Tågproblem i Västsverige
description.author: webmaster@kuriren.com
description.content:
Luleå. Efter en intensiv totalrenovering av huset på Vackerbacken hann familjen Wikström bara bo i sin Norrbottensgård under ett års tid innan en brand gjorde dem hemlösa. Förra julen firades i den tillfälliga bostaden i gårdshuset och Helena plockade inte fram en enda julpinal. Det tar hon igen – med råge – när hon nu äntligen får fira jul i det återuppbyggda drömhemmet.
Video Äntligen jul på Vackerbacken igen

description.hltext_display: 物联网标准标准体系复杂短期难出台
description.content:
【字体：大 中 小】
“物联网标准很复杂，短期难以出台。”国家工信部电子科技委副主任张琪介绍，目前国家12个部委23个已有的标准工作组正联合积极参与标准的制定。
分析人士指出，物联网大规模落地的首要条件便是标准体系的建立，如果行业、企业之间物联网应用标准难以达成一致，将导致物联网项目难以互“联”。
争夺话语权
在资本市场，物联网概念被热捧。根据Wind数据统计，截至12月20日，今年物联网板块46家上市的平均市值涨幅为20.32%，而全部A股的平均市值则下跌3.44%左右，物联网概念明显受宠。
与资本市场的热捧不同，大多数企业更加现实。由于商业模式还不成熟，部分企业介入物联网只是为了获取产业基金和税收支持，因此不少企业只是明确了物联网作为其发展方向，却迟迟没有项目落地。
无锡物联网产业研究院院长刘海涛认为，物联网产业发展的步骤首先是要占领标准制高点，其次是实现“技术卡位”，第三才是打造完整的物联网产业价值链。
“标准化的实质是知识产权的较量。”中国RFID产业联盟的秘书长欧阳宇指出，很多国际的标准都暗含着大量的知识产权，国内企业使用或采购的产品一旦符合这些标准就需要支付大笔的产权费用，另外标准化背后还存在管理匹配的问题，这也涉及到产业安全。
因而，目前国际上大力推进国家层面的物联网标准，业内人士指出，这与3G标准有类似之处，在某种程度上也是话语权之争，因此中国需要自有标准。据了解，目前物联网中的RFID产业发展相对成熟，而国际标准化传感网标准化组织总共设立3个标准化项目组，其中系统架构分为7部分，我国专家占2个主席位和5个联合主席位。

description.hltext_display: ICW Desak KPK Tindaklanjuti Kasus Korupsi Hutan Riau
description.content:
TEMPO Interaktif, Jakarta - Indonesia Corruption Watch (ICW) mendesak Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) segera menindaklanjuti kasus-kasus lama dugaan korupsi kehutanan di Provinsi Riau, yang sempat terhenti.
"Aneh sekali KPK menetapkan tersangka lama sekali. Jangan sampai KPK kena sindrom Kejaksaan Agung dalam menyidik perkara," kata aktivis ICW Tama S. Langkun di kantor KPK, Rabu (22/12).
Menurut Tama, ada beberapa kasus yang masih menggantung selama dua tahun ini. Dari empat bupati yang diduga terlibat, baru satu lagi yang telah ditetapkan sebagai tersangka yaitu Bupati Siak, Arwin AS. Arwin sudah ditetapkan sebagai tersangka sejak September 2009. Sebelumnya dua mantan kepala dinas kehutanan (Kadishut) di dua kabupaten yang berbeda yaitu Syuhada Tasman dan Baharuddin Husin yang sudah ditetapkan tersangka sejak 2008 silam.
"Yang ini (Arwin) sudah ditetapkan tersangka tapi belum diproses juga. Padahal masih ada dua bupati lagi yang diduga juga terlibat belum ditetapkan sebagai tersangka," katanya. Namun dia enggan menyebut dua bupati lainnya. Soal kasus tiga bupati ini, Tama mengaku membawa sejumlah dokumen yang akan diberikan ke KPK.
Selain para bupati ini, kata Tama, ICW mencatat masih ada tiga mantan kadishut yang sudah dijadikan tersangka tapi belum juga ditahan KPK. Dua di antaranya bahkan sudah ditetapkan sebagai tersangka oleh KPK sejak 2008. "Ada level kadishut yang belum diproses sama sekali. Akibat korupsi penerbitan ijin hutan ini negara mengalami kerugian mencapai Rp 2,8 triliun," ujarnya.
Terkait kasus ini, Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) telah memvonis Bupati Pelelawan Tengku Azmun Jaafar dengan pidana 11 tahun dan denda sebesar Rp 500 juta. Azmun juga diwajibkan membayar uang pengganti sebesar Rp 12 miliar karena menyebabkan kerugian negara sebesar Rp 1,2 triliun.
Dalam laporan ICW, Azmun merupakan salah satu dari empat bupati yang menerbitkan izin Usaha Pemanfaatan Hasil Hutan Kayu Hutan Tanaman (IUPHHKHT) untuk 13 perusahaan. Tiga bupati lainnya termasuk Arwin AS yang sudah dijadikan tersangka sejak September 2009 oleh KPK sampai saat ini perkembangan kasusnya belum jelas.

description.hltext_display: Lebanon-based Cracker Barrel takes Southern fare to Northern borders
description.content:
SOUTH PORTLAND, Maine Southern-fried restaurant chain Cracker Barrel is finding hungry customers in the land of lobster, steamers and baked beans. Cracker Barrel General Store's first restaurant in Maine represents the chain's northernmost foray along the East Coast. And Mainers seem to be taking a shine to the chicken and dumplings, biscuits and sawmill gravy, and other Southern staples such as turnip greens, pork barbecue and grits.
Well, scratch the grits.
"I'll try anything once, but I'm not trying those grits. No way," Sandra Butler of South Portland said with a chuckle, after giving fried okra and turnip greens a try.
Southern cooking knows no boundaries, apparently. The South Portland restaurant was running 25 percent ahead of projections when it opened last month, according to the company.
Decorated with antiques, rocking chairs and checkerboards, the restaurant presents a familiar face to New Englanders who've traveled through Florida and other parts of the South where Cracker Barrels are a highway fixture. And they've developed a loyal following, even far north of the Mason-Dixon line.
Chris and Anne Taylor of Topsham readily confess that they used to drive two hours to eat at a Cracker Barrel in Massachusetts before the South Portland restaurant opened. Now the restaurant is only 30 miles away, and they've made it a Wednesday night ritual to dine there for "date night."
"The nice thing about a place like this is you get to experience a little taste of another part of the country cuisine that you don't get if you grow up in Maine," he said.
Different fare
New England isn't exactly known for daring cuisine.
Staples include baked cod and haddock, pulled from the North Atlantic. In the summer, there are steamed mussels and clams. And of course, New England is known for chowder, lobster and baked bean suppers.
Cracker Barrel's menu is different. It features things such as country-fried steak, fried chicken, fried chicken livers and catfish; fried apples, pinto beans, turnip greens and hashbrown casserole; for dessert there's a plethora of cobblers. (2 of 2)The Tennessee-based restaurant chain got its start in 1969 when Danny Evans opened a restaurant with an eye to recreating the country store of yesteryear, when crackers were delivered in barrels and barrels were recycled as checkerboard tables. The South Portland restaurant can seat 207, but the company markets the modern Cracker Barrel as a place where customers can find time to slow down.
Until the early 1990s, the company stuck mostly to its base in the South, but now it has 597 restaurants in 42 states.
The South Portland restaurant opens as customers around the country have shown greater willingness over the past six to eight months to dine out after a disastrous couple of years in which restaurants were hard-hit by bankruptcies, said R.J. Hottovy, senior analyst at Chicago-based Morningstar, an investment research firm.
"There's a willingness to spend more, or to allocate more dollars to dining out," he said. "Generally speaking, we have seen traffic improve in the casual dining space."
With $2.4 billion in revenue for its last fiscal year, the company is looking for additional opportunities to expand and hasn't ruled out more locations in Maine.
That'd be just fine with Elizabeth Grant of Westbrook. The homey feel and comfort food take her back to a simpler time.
"What draws us to it is that it's just like home cooking. Even though it's a big restaurant, a big chain of restaurants, they still capture that," she said. "It's nice."

event_or_fact.property: Even though it's a big restaurant, a big chain of restaurants, they still capture that; It's nice.
The nice thing about a place like this is you get to experience a little taste of another part of the country cuisine that you don't get if you grow up in Maine
There's a willingness to spend more, or to allocate more dollars to dining out; Generally speaking, we have seen traffic improve in the casual dining space.

description.hltext_display: Cincinnati State may not use all buildings city acquired for campus here
description.author: Jessica Heffner
description.content: MIDDLETOWN - Just what will happen to some of the buildings acquired by the city if a new college campus doesn’t want them was a subject of discussion at the City Council meeting Tuesday night.

description.hltext_display: حبيب لــ"NOW Lebanon": اللبنانيون باتوا يعلمون علم اليقين من يعطل مصالحهم وآمل أن يسود منطق الشرعية لا منطق الميليشيات والضغوطات
description.content:
لفت عضو كتلة "القوات اللبنانية" النائب فريد حبيب إلى أنّ "عملية شلّ مجلس الوزراء تشكل استهدافاً مباشراً للمجلس في سبيل إرضاخه لمطالب فريق 8 آذار بإحالة ملف ما يسمّى "شهود الزور" إلى المجلس العدلي"، وانتقد في هذا السياق "إصرار هذا الفريق على التدخل في صلاحيات رئيس مجلس الوزراء الذي ينص الدستور على أنه هو من يحدد جدول أعمال جلسات المجلس بالتشاور مع رئيس الجمهورية"، مشيرًا إلى أنّ "حزب الله وحلفاءه اعتادوا تجاوز الدستور والقانون والشرعية وأثبتوا أنهم لا يقيمون وزنا لها في العديد العديد من المحطات خلال السنوات الاخيرة".
حبيب، وفي حديث لموقع “nowlebanon.com” إستغرب "مقولة أنّ من يعطّل مصالح الناس هو فريق 14 آذار"، وأوضح في المقابل أنّ "كلّ أطياف الشعب اللبناني باتت تعلم علم اليقين من يعطّل مصالحهم وأعمالهم، ومن يعرقل بتّ أكثر من 300 بند مدرج على جدول أعمال مجلس الوزراء تتعلق بمجملها بمعالجة الأوضاع الحياتية والمعيشية الصعبة والمتفاقمة"، مشيرًا في هذا السياق إلى أنّ الفريق الآخر يأخذ مصالح المواطنين رهينة مطلبه بإحالة ملف ما يسمى شهود الزور إلى المجلس العدلي".
وإذ أكد أنّ "الهدف من وراء طرح مسألة شهود الزور ليس قضائياً"، شدّد حبيب على أن "فريق 14 آذار تجاوب كثيراً في تعاطيه مع هذه المسألة من خلال عدة مبادرات وحلول قانونية طرحها لمقاربة هذا الملف العالق، ولكن "على من تقرأ مزاميرك يا داوود""، لأن قوى 8 آذار ما زالت متصلّبة في موقفها مستندة إلى حيثيات ومطالعات غير قانونية وغير دستورية بمجملها، تتجاوز هيبة الدولة وهيبة القضاء والقانون"، معربًا عن أمله في المقابل في "التوصل قريبًا إلى تسوية ما تتيح بت هذا الموضوع نهائيًا بما يحفظ هيبة الدولة والقانون والقضاء، لكي يصار المجال مفتوحًا أمام الإنصراف إلى معالجة ومتابعة شؤون المواطنين وحاجاتهم الإجتماعية والإقتصادية والإنمائية".
حبيب الذي وصف مضمون الخطاب الأخير لأمين عام "حزب الله" السيد حسن نصرالله بأنه "كان خطابًا واقعياً وموزوناً لجهة وجوب انتظار القرار الإتهامي ليبنى على الشيء مقتضاه"، قال: "نحن لا نريد ظلمًا لأي فريق أو لأي جهة معنية، لذلك علينا جميعاً كأفرقاء سياسيين أن نكون صفاً واحداً متضامنًا لمعالجة تداعيات هذا القرار على الساحة اللبنانية، بشكل يجعلنا نحفظ وحدتنا واستقرارنا ونصون مصالح وطننا العليا ونمنع أي فتنة بين اللبنانيين"، مضيفًا: "نحن أكدنا ونؤكد مرارًا على أنه في حال صدر القرار الإتهامي ولم يكن يتضمن أدلة ومعطيات دامغة وقاطعة، فإننا سنرفض هذا القرار وسنكون أول من يواجهه، لأننا نريد كشف الحقيقة ولا نبحث عن اتهامات ظالمة لأحد".
وردًا على سؤال، رأى حبيب أنّ "هناك ضبابية تلف المساعي أو الأفكار السعودية – السورية" حيال حلحلة الأزمة اللبنانية، وفي حين شدد على أنّ "هذه الجهود والمساعي هي مساعٍ مشكورة لدعوتها إلى الحفاظ على الاستقرار وتهدئة الوضع في لبنان"، أكد حبيب أنّ "الحلّ الجذري والنهائي (للأزمة اللبنانية) هو بيد اللبنانيين أنفسهم من خلال الحوار الداخلي"، لافتًا في هذا السياق إلى أنّ "إستمرار البعض بالتخوين والتهويل وتهديد بقية الشركاء في الوطن بالويل والثبور وعظائم الأمور، لا يخدم بالطبع اللبنانيين ولا المصلحة اللبنانية العليا".
وفي الإطار عينه، رفض حبيب "انتظار الحل من الخارج"، وسأل عن "الاسباب التي تحول دون تحاور اللبنانيين وتفاهمهم على شؤون لا تعني سواهم"، لافتًا إلى أنه "اذا تعثر هذا الحوار الداخلي في مكان ما فعندها يجب الإحتكام في حل الخلافات الى الدستور والقوانين مرعية الإجراء".
وفي ختام حديثه، تمنى حبيب "أن يسود منطق الدولة الشرعية في لبنان، وليس منطق الميليشيا أو منطق الضغوطات على الدولة اللبنانية وعلى مؤسساتها الدستورية لفرض اجندة سياسية معينة"، مشددًا في هذا المجال على كون "الدولة الشرعية التي تضمّ تحت جناحيها جميع التيارات والفئات والشرائح اللبنانية هي التي توفر الحماية للجميع"، وأضاف: "نحن لسنا متخوفين على الأمن والاستقرار، في ظل وجود جيش وطني قادر على القيام بواجباته وتحمّل مسؤولياته في الحفاظ على النظام والأمن والاستقرار والسلم الأهلي في لبنان".

description.hltext_display: BRIEF: Tax-aide volunteers will train to assist
Narkoba Senilai Rp 8 Miliar Dikendalikan WNA dari Penjara
description.content:
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 | 14:58 WIB
BesarKecil Normal
TEMPO Interaktif, Jakarta -Narkoba jenis sabu-sabu dan ekstasi senilai Rp 8 miliar yang disita jajaran Direktorat Narkoba Polda Metro Jaya pada 11 dan 12 Desember lalu diketahui dikendalikan oleh John, warga negara asing penghuni Lembaga Pemasyarakatan Cipinang, Jakarta Timur. “Barang itu dikendalikan oleh John dari dalam penjara melalui ponsel. Tapi kai masih mencari John masih kami cari karena banyak yang bernama John di sana (LP Cipinang). Bisa jadi juga itu nama palsu,” kata Kepala Bidang Humas Polda Metro Jaya, Komisaris Besar Baharudin Djafar di Mapolda Metro Jaya, hari ini.
Sebelumnya, pada 11 dan 12 Desember lalu, Direktorat Narkoba Polda Metro Jaya menangkap empat warga negara Indonesia (WNI) yang membawa narkoba jenis sabu sebanyak 4.882 gram, ekstasi 18 butir dan bahan pembuat shabu, ephedrine sebanyak 18.000 butir dari Cina. Berdasar pengembangan polisi, lanjut Baharudin, keempat tersangka berinisial OKT, 34, YT alias LX, 48, MY, 32, dan EDH alias JE ,35, itu ternyata dikendalikan oleh John.“John dikenalkan kepada ED oleh Amin Tato," kata Baharuddin.
Menurut Kepala Satuan I Direktorat Narkoba Polda Metro Jaya, Ajun Komisaris Besar Hendra Joni, penangkapan keempat tersangka berawal dari informasi masyarakat bahwa OKT yang beralamat di Kampung Bojong, Kedung Waringin, Bekasi, Jawa Barat mengedarkan narkoba jenis sabu. Menindak lanjuti laporan itu, kata Hendra, polisi kemudian menyelidiki aktivitas OKT dan rekannya LX selama satu bulan. “Baru pada 11 Desember pukul 18.30 WIB kami menangkap OKT dan LX dan menemukan barang bukti 13 gram sabu,” kata Hendra.
Keesokannya pada pukul 08.30, polisi berhasil menangkap tersangka lainnya, MY dan ikut menyita barang bukti berupa sembilan gram sabu dan 18 butir ekstasi setelah menggeledah di rumah kos di Perumahan Sunter Hijau, Jalan Kiranan, Jakarta Utara. Kepada polisi, ia mengaku mendapatkan barang tersebut dari ED alias JE.
Polisi lalu menangkap ED alias JE di Mall Pluit Junction, Jakarta Utara dan menyita dua ponsel dan sepucuk air soft gun model KJ Work. Setelah dilakukan penggeledahan di apartemen pelaku di The Boulevard, Tanah Abang, Jakarta Pusat, polisi juga menemukan 4.860 gram sabu. Saat dilakukan juga penggeledahan di Apartemen Teluk Intan, Jakarta Utara yang juga dimiliki ED, polisi kembali menyita 0,4 gram shabu dan 18.000 butir tablet Ephedrine. “Dari keterangan ED itulah diketahui bahwa jaringannya dikendalikan oleh Jhon yang ada di LP Cipinang,” kata Hendra lagi.
Keempat tersangka itu, dijerat UU Nomor 35 tahun 2009 tentang Narkotika dengan ancaman hukuman mati, seumur hidup, atau pidana minimal lima tahun dan maksimal 20 tahun serta denda 10 miliar.

description.hltext_display: Guns Are Popular Gift For Women
description.content:
DAYTONA BEACH, Fla -- According to some local businesses, a handgun is a popular gift this year, especially for women.
Forrest Buckwald, owner of Buck's Gun Rack in Daytona Beach, said crime and an increase in consumer spending is why business is up this holiday season.
He said they've seen a 30 percent increase and many of the buyers are women, or men purchasing a gun for their wives, girlfriends, or daughters.
Edwin Vega said his daughter put a gun on her Christmas list this year to protect herself.
"She doesn't want to come home, nobody at the house, and get into the house and somebody there," Vega said.
Buckwald said this is the first big spike in sales since 2008 when some believed the president was going to ban assualt rifles.

description.hltext_display: Vegas' struggle for acceptance
description.content:
After just two years playing as a professional, Jhonattan Vegas is going where no Venezuelan golfer has gone before. SBS Lachlan Guselli looks at Jhonattan Vegas struggle for acceptance as the golfer prepares to become Venezuelas first player on the prestigious US PGA Tour.After just two years playing as a professional, this 26-year-old is going where no Venezuelan golfer has gone before. "Well, it's actually one goal I had for my whole life and to achieve it is something terrific," Vegas told SBS. For Vegas it wasn't always this easy.
Growing up in the oil fields of the Orinoco Basin his father was the local course groundskeeper teaching his son from the age of two, the game that he loved. "I was always playing golf. Since he was a baby he saw me playing golf and practicing, and he was always with me in the field," his father Carlos Vegas said.
What should be a celebration in Venezuela will fall on deaf ears from the government in Caracas.
President Hugo Chavez, has taken to golf in a way that leaves Vegas and his father fearing for the future of the game.
Chavez has labelled it a 'Bourgeoise sport' The notions seems at odds with his own socialist heroes - Cuban revolutionary leader Che Guevara grew up playing golf in Argentina and was captured on film having a hit on one of Cubas last courses in Havana with President Fidel Castro.
Chavez has threatened to expropriate private courses across Venezuela to make way for public housing complexes whilst he has already closed many public courses including the one that Carlos Vega once maintained.
A mere 17 courses now remain in Vegas' home nation severely limiting the reach of the sport, but Vegas could be the beacon of hope, not just for would be golfers, but also for the poor.
